verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوۡبَةٗ نَّصُوحًا عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أَن يُكَفِّرَ عَنكُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمۡ وَيُدۡخِلَكُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ يَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡزِي ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّبِيَّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥۖ نُورُهُمۡ يَسۡعَىٰ بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَبِأَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ أَتۡمِمۡ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo tooboo ila Allahi tawbatan nasoohan AAasa rabbukum an yukaffira AAankum sayyiatikum wayudkhilakum jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu yawma la yukhzee Allahu alnnabiyya waallatheena amanoo maAAahu nooruhum yasAAa bayna aydeehim wabiaymanihim yaqooloona rabbana atmim lana noorana waighfir lana innaka AAala kulli shayin qadeerun

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ جَٰهِدِ ٱلۡكُفَّارَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱغۡلُظۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alnnabiyyu jahidi alkuffara waalmunafiqeena waoghluth AAalayhim wamawahum jahannamu wabisa almaseeru

verses.text: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱمۡرَأَتَ نُوحٖ وَٱمۡرَأَتَ لُوطٖۖ كَانَتَا تَحۡتَ عَبۡدَيۡنِ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا صَٰلِحَيۡنِ فَخَانَتَاهُمَا فَلَمۡ يُغۡنِيَا عَنۡهُمَا مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗا وَقِيلَ ٱدۡخُلَا ٱلنَّارَ مَعَ ٱلدَّـٰخِلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Daraba Allahu mathalan lillatheena kafaroo imraata noohin waimraata lootin kanata tahta AAabdayni min AAibadina salihayni fakhanatahuma falam yughniya AAanhuma mina Allahi shayan waqeela odkhula alnnara maAAa alddakhileena

verses.text: وَضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱمۡرَأَتَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِذۡ قَالَتۡ رَبِّ ٱبۡنِ لِي عِندَكَ بَيۡتٗا فِي ٱلۡجَنَّةِ وَنَجِّنِي مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَعَمَلِهِۦ وَنَجِّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wadaraba Allahu mathalan lillatheena amanoo imraata firAAawna ith qalat rabbi ibni lee AAindaka baytan fee aljannati wanajjinee min firAAawna waAAamalihi wanajjinee mina alqawmi alththalimeena

verses.text: وَمَرۡيَمَ ٱبۡنَتَ عِمۡرَٰنَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَحۡصَنَتۡ فَرۡجَهَا فَنَفَخۡنَا فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِنَا وَصَدَّقَتۡ بِكَلِمَٰتِ رَبِّهَا وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَكَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِتِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wamaryama ibnata AAimrana allatee ahsanat farjaha fanafakhna feehi min roohina wasaddaqat bikalimati rabbiha wakutubihi wakanat mina alqaniteena

verses.text: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِي بِيَدِهِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Tabaraka allathee biyadihi almulku wahuwa AAala kulli shayin qadeerun

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ لِيَبۡلُوَكُمۡ أَيُّكُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلٗاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡغَفُورُ
verses.transliteration: Allathee khalaqa almawta waalhayata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu AAamalan wahuwa alAAazeezu alghafooru

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗاۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِي خَلۡقِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِن تَفَٰوُتٖۖ فَٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ هَلۡ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورٖ
verses.transliteration: Allathee khalaqa sabAAa samawatin tibaqan ma tara fee khalqi alrrahmani min tafawutin fairjiAAi albasara hal tara min futoorin

verses.text: ثُمَّ ٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيۡنِ يَنقَلِبۡ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ خَاسِئٗا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٞ
verses.transliteration: Thumma irjiAAi albasara karratayni yanqalib ilayka albasaru khasian wahuwa haseerun

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِمَصَٰبِيحَ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهَا رُجُومٗا لِّلشَّيَٰطِينِۖ وَأَعۡتَدۡنَا لَهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
verses.transliteration: Walaqad zayyanna alssamaa alddunya bimasabeeha wajaAAalnaha rujooman lilshshayateeni waaAAtadna lahum AAathaba alssaAAeeri

verses.text: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِرَبِّهِمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
verses.transliteration: Walillatheena kafaroo birabbihim AAathabu jahannama wabisa almaseeru

verses.text: إِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ فِيهَا سَمِعُواْ لَهَا شَهِيقٗا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ
verses.transliteration: Itha olqoo feeha samiAAoo laha shaheeqan wahiya tafooru

verses.text: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ ٱلۡغَيۡظِۖ كُلَّمَآ أُلۡقِيَ فِيهَا فَوۡجٞ سَأَلَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ
verses.transliteration: Takadu tamayyazu mina alghaythi kullama olqiya feeha fawjun saalahum khazanatuha alam yatikum natheerun

verses.text: قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٞ فَكَذَّبۡنَا وَقُلۡنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَيۡءٍ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ كَبِيرٖ
verses.transliteration: Qaloo bala qad jaana natheerun fakaththabna waqulna ma nazzala Allahu min shayin in antum illa fee dalalin kabeerin

verses.text: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡ كُنَّا نَسۡمَعُ أَوۡ نَعۡقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
verses.transliteration: Waqaloo law kunna nasmaAAu aw naAAqilu ma kunna fee ashabi alssaAAeeri

verses.text: فَٱعۡتَرَفُواْ بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسُحۡقٗا لِّأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
verses.transliteration: FaiAAtarafoo bithanbihim fasuhqan liashabi alssaAAeeri

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ
verses.transliteration: Inna allatheena yakhshawna rabbahum bialghaybi lahum maghfiratun waajrun kabeerun

verses.text: وَأَسِرُّواْ قَوۡلَكُمۡ أَوِ ٱجۡهَرُواْ بِهِۦٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.transliteration: Waasirroo qawlakum awi ijharoo bihi innahu AAaleemun bithati alssudoori

verses.text: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ
verses.transliteration: Ala yaAAlamu man khalaqa wahuwa allateefu alkhabeeru

verses.text: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ ذَلُولٗا فَٱمۡشُواْ فِي مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُواْ مِن رِّزۡقِهِۦۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ
verses.transliteration: Huwa allathee jaAAala lakumu alarda thaloolan faimshoo fee manakibiha wakuloo min rizqihi wailayhi alnnushooru

verses.text: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخۡسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَمُورُ
verses.transliteration: Aamintum man fee alssamai an yakhsifa bikumu alarda faitha hiya tamooru

verses.text: أَمۡ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَاصِبٗاۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ كَيۡفَ نَذِيرِ
verses.transliteration: Am amintum man fee alssamai an yursila AAalaykum hasiban fasataAAlamoona kayfa natheeri

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
verses.transliteration: Walaqad kaththaba allatheena min qablihim fakayfa kana nakeeri

verses.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيۡرِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٖ وَيَقۡبِضۡنَۚ مَا يُمۡسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءِۭ بَصِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Awalam yaraw ila alttayri fawqahum saffatin wayaqbidna ma yumsikuhunna illa alrrahmanu innahu bikulli shayin baseerun

verses.text: أَمَّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي هُوَ جُندٞ لَّكُمۡ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ إِنِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِي غُرُورٍ
verses.transliteration: Amman hatha allathee huwa jundun lakum yansurukum min dooni alrrahmani ini alkafiroona illa fee ghuroorin

verses.text: أَمَّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي يَرۡزُقُكُمۡ إِنۡ أَمۡسَكَ رِزۡقَهُۥۚ بَل لَّجُّواْ فِي عُتُوّٖ وَنُفُورٍ
verses.transliteration: Amman hatha allathee yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqahu bal lajjoo fee AAutuwwin wanufoorin

verses.text: أَفَمَن يَمۡشِي مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجۡهِهِۦٓ أَهۡدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمۡشِي سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
verses.transliteration: Afaman yamshee mukibban AAala wajhihi ahda amman yamshee sawiyyan AAala siratin mustaqeemin

verses.text: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَكُمۡ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul huwa allathee anshaakum wajaAAala lakumu alssamAAa waalabsara waalafidata qaleelan ma tashkuroona

verses.text: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul huwa allathee tharaakum fee alardi wailayhi tuhsharoona

verses.text: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wayaqooloona mata hatha alwaAAdu in kuntum sadiqeena

verses.text: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
verses.transliteration: Qul innama alAAilmu AAinda Allahi wainnama ana natheerun mubeenun

verses.text: فَلَمَّا رَأَوۡهُ زُلۡفَةٗ سِيٓـَٔتۡ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَقِيلَ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Falamma raawhu zulfatan seeat wujoohu allatheena kafaroo waqeela hatha allathee kuntum bihi taddaAAoona

verses.text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَهۡلَكَنِيَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِيَ أَوۡ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ مِنۡ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ
verses.transliteration: Qul araaytum in ahlakaniya Allahu waman maAAiya aw rahimana faman yujeeru alkafireena min AAathabin aleemin

verses.text: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَاۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ هُوَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
verses.transliteration: Qul huwa alrrahmanu amanna bihi waAAalayhi tawakkalna fasataAAlamoona man huwa fee dalalin mubeenin

verses.text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَصۡبَحَ مَآؤُكُمۡ غَوۡرٗا فَمَن يَأۡتِيكُم بِمَآءٖ مَّعِينِۭ
verses.transliteration: Qul araaytum in asbaha maokum ghawran faman yateekum bimain maAAeenin

verses.text: نٓۚ وَٱلۡقَلَمِ وَمَا يَسۡطُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Noon waalqalami wama yasturoona

verses.text: مَآ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ بِمَجۡنُونٖ
verses.transliteration: Ma anta biniAAmati rabbika bimajnoonin

verses.text: وَإِنَّ لَكَ لَأَجۡرًا غَيۡرَ مَمۡنُونٖ
verses.transliteration: Wainna laka laajran ghayra mamnoonin

verses.text: وَإِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ خُلُقٍ عَظِيمٖ
verses.transliteration: Wainnaka laAAala khuluqin AAatheemin

verses.text: فَسَتُبۡصِرُ وَيُبۡصِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fasatubsiru wayubsiroona

verses.text: بِأَييِّكُمُ ٱلۡمَفۡتُونُ
verses.transliteration: Biayyikumu almaftoonu

verses.text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ
verses.transliteration: Inna rabbaka huwa aAAlamu biman dalla AAan sabeelihi wahuwa aAAlamu bialmuhtadeena

verses.text: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fala tutiAAi almukaththibeena

verses.text: وَدُّواْ لَوۡ تُدۡهِنُ فَيُدۡهِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Waddoo law tudhinu fayudhinoona

verses.text: وَلَا تُطِعۡ كُلَّ حَلَّافٖ مَّهِينٍ
verses.transliteration: Wala tutiAA kulla hallafin maheenin

verses.text: هَمَّازٖ مَّشَّآءِۭ بِنَمِيمٖ
verses.transliteration: Hammazin mashshain binameemin

verses.text: مَّنَّاعٖ لِّلۡخَيۡرِ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.transliteration: MannaAAin lilkhayri muAAtadin atheemin

verses.text: عُتُلِّۭ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ زَنِيمٍ
verses.transliteration: AAutullin baAAda thalika zaneemin

verses.text: أَن كَانَ ذَا مَالٖ وَبَنِينَ
verses.transliteration: An kana tha malin wabaneena

verses.text: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Itha tutla AAalayhi ayatuna qala asateeru alawwaleena

verses.text: سَنَسِمُهُۥ عَلَى ٱلۡخُرۡطُومِ
verses.transliteration: Sanasimuhu AAala alkhurtoomi

verses.text: إِنَّا بَلَوۡنَٰهُمۡ كَمَا بَلَوۡنَآ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ إِذۡ أَقۡسَمُواْ لَيَصۡرِمُنَّهَا مُصۡبِحِينَ
verses.transliteration: Inna balawnahum kama balawna ashaba aljannati ith aqsamoo layasrimunnaha musbiheena

verses.text: وَلَا يَسۡتَثۡنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wala yastathnoona

verses.text: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا طَآئِفٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fatafa AAalayha taifun min rabbika wahum naimoona

verses.text: فَأَصۡبَحَتۡ كَٱلصَّرِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Faasbahat kaalssareemi

verses.text: فَتَنَادَوۡاْ مُصۡبِحِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fatanadaw musbiheena

verses.text: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Ani ighdoo AAala harthikum in kuntum sarimeena

verses.text: فَٱنطَلَقُواْ وَهُمۡ يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ
verses.transliteration: Faintalaqoo wahum yatakhafatoona

verses.text: أَن لَّا يَدۡخُلَنَّهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّسۡكِينٞ
verses.transliteration: An la yadkhulannaha alyawma AAalaykum miskeenun

verses.text: وَغَدَوۡاْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡدٖ قَٰدِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Waghadaw AAala hardin qadireena

verses.text: فَلَمَّا رَأَوۡهَا قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا لَضَآلُّونَ
verses.transliteration: Falamma raawha qaloo inna ladalloona

verses.text: بَلۡ نَحۡنُ مَحۡرُومُونَ
verses.transliteration: Bal nahnu mahroomoona

verses.text: قَالَ أَوۡسَطُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ لَوۡلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qala awsatuhum alam aqul lakum lawla tusabbihoona

verses.text: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaloo subhana rabbina inna kunna thalimeena

verses.text: فَأَقۡبَلَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ يَتَلَٰوَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Faaqbala baAAduhum AAala baAAdin yatalawamoona

verses.text: قَالُواْ يَٰوَيۡلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا طَٰغِينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaloo ya waylana inna kunna tagheena

verses.text: عَسَىٰ رَبُّنَآ أَن يُبۡدِلَنَا خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهَآ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا رَٰغِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: AAasa rabbuna an yubdilana khayran minha inna ila rabbina raghiboona

verses.text: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡعَذَابُۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Kathalika alAAathabu walaAAathabu alakhirati akbaru law kanoo yaAAlamoona

verses.text: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Inna lilmuttaqeena AAinda rabbihim jannati alnnaAAeemi

verses.text: أَفَنَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ كَٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: AfanajAAalu almuslimeena kaalmujrimeena

verses.text: مَا لَكُمۡ كَيۡفَ تَحۡكُمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Ma lakum kayfa tahkumoona

verses.text: أَمۡ لَكُمۡ كِتَٰبٞ فِيهِ تَدۡرُسُونَ
verses.transliteration: Am lakum kitabun feehi tadrusoona

verses.text: إِنَّ لَكُمۡ فِيهِ لَمَا تَخَيَّرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Inna lakum feehi lama takhayyaroona

verses.text: أَمۡ لَكُمۡ أَيۡمَٰنٌ عَلَيۡنَا بَٰلِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ إِنَّ لَكُمۡ لَمَا تَحۡكُمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Am lakum aymanun AAalayna balighatun ila yawmi alqiyamati inna lakum lama tahkumoona

verses.text: سَلۡهُمۡ أَيُّهُم بِذَٰلِكَ زَعِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Salhum ayyuhum bithalika zaAAeemun

verses.text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَكَآءُ فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Am lahum shurakao falyatoo bishurakaihim in kanoo sadiqeena

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يُكۡشَفُ عَن سَاقٖ وَيُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yawma yukshafu AAan saqin wayudAAawna ila alssujoodi fala yastateeAAoona

verses.text: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۖ وَقَدۡ كَانُواْ يُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمۡ سَٰلِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: KhashiAAatan absaruhum tarhaquhum thillatun waqad kanoo yudAAawna ila alssujoodi wahum salimoona

verses.text: فَذَرۡنِي وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِۖ سَنَسۡتَدۡرِجُهُم مِّنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fatharnee waman yukaththibu bihatha alhadeethi sanastadrijuhum min haythu la yaAAlamoona

verses.text: وَأُمۡلِي لَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ كَيۡدِي مَتِينٌ
verses.transliteration: Waomlee lahum inna kaydee mateenun

verses.text: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muthqaloona

verses.text: أَمۡ عِندَهُمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبُ فَهُمۡ يَكۡتُبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Am AAindahumu alghaybu fahum yaktuboona

verses.text: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلۡحُوتِ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكۡظُومٞ
verses.transliteration: Faisbir lihukmi rabbika wala takun kasahibi alhooti ith nada wahuwa makthoomun

verses.text: لَّوۡلَآ أَن تَدَٰرَكَهُۥ نِعۡمَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ لَنُبِذَ بِٱلۡعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ مَذۡمُومٞ
verses.transliteration: Lawla an tadarakahu niAAmatun min rabbihi lanubitha bialAAarai wahuwa mathmoomun

verses.text: فَٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَجَعَلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.transliteration: Faijtabahu rabbuhu fajaAAalahu mina alssaliheena

verses.text: وَإِن يَكَادُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَيُزۡلِقُونَكَ بِأَبۡصَٰرِهِمۡ لَمَّا سَمِعُواْ ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُۥ لَمَجۡنُونٞ
verses.transliteration: Wain yakadu allatheena kafaroo layuzliqoonaka biabsarihim lamma samiAAoo alththikra wayaqooloona innahu lamajnoonun

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wama huwa illa thikrun lilAAalameena

verses.text: ٱلۡحَآقَّةُ
verses.transliteration: Alhaqqatu

verses.text: مَا ٱلۡحَآقَّةُ
verses.transliteration: Ma alhaqqatu

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡحَآقَّةُ
verses.transliteration: Wama adraka ma alhaqqatu

verses.text: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ وَعَادُۢ بِٱلۡقَارِعَةِ
verses.transliteration: Kaththabat thamoodu waAAadun bialqariAAati

verses.text: فَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَأُهۡلِكُواْ بِٱلطَّاغِيَةِ
verses.transliteration: Faamma thamoodu faohlikoo bialttaghiyati

verses.text: وَأَمَّا عَادٞ فَأُهۡلِكُواْ بِرِيحٖ صَرۡصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٖ
verses.transliteration: Waamma AAadun faohlikoo bireehin sarsarin AAatiyatin

verses.text: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَبۡعَ لَيَالٖ وَثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومٗاۖ فَتَرَى ٱلۡقَوۡمَ فِيهَا صَرۡعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٍ خَاوِيَةٖ
verses.transliteration: Sakhkharaha AAalayhim sabAAa layalin wathamaniyata ayyamin husooman fatara alqawma feeha sarAAa kaannahum aAAjazu nakhlin khawiyatun

verses.text: فَهَلۡ تَرَىٰ لَهُم مِّنۢ بَاقِيَةٖ
verses.transliteration: Fahal tara lahum min baqiyatin

verses.text: وَجَآءَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَمَن قَبۡلَهُۥ وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَٰتُ بِٱلۡخَاطِئَةِ
verses.transliteration: Wajaa firAAawnu waman qablahu waalmutafikatu bialkhatiati

verses.text: فَعَصَوۡاْ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ أَخۡذَةٗ رَّابِيَةً
verses.transliteration: FaAAasaw rasoola rabbihim faakhathahum akhthatan rabiyatan

verses.text: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ
verses.transliteration: Inna lamma tagha almao hamalnakum fee aljariyati

verses.text: لِنَجۡعَلَهَا لَكُمۡ تَذۡكِرَةٗ وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٞ وَٰعِيَةٞ
verses.transliteration: LinajAAalaha lakum tathkiratan wataAAiyaha othunun waAAiyatun

verses.text: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ نَفۡخَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Faitha nufikha fee alssoori nafkhatun wahidatun

verses.text: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ
verses.transliteration: Wahumilati alardu waaljibalu fadukkata dakkatan wahidatan

verses.text: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ وَقَعَتِ ٱلۡوَاقِعَةُ
verses.transliteration: Fayawmaithin waqaAAati alwaqiAAatu

verses.text: وَٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَهِيَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَاهِيَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Wainshaqqati alssamao fahiya yawmaithin wahiyatun

verses.text: وَٱلۡمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرۡجَآئِهَاۚ وَيَحۡمِلُ عَرۡشَ رَبِّكَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ ثَمَٰنِيَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Waalmalaku AAala arjaiha wayahmilu AAarsha rabbika fawqahum yawmaithin thamaniyatun

verses.text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِنكُمۡ خَافِيَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Yawmaithin tuAAradoona la takhfa minkum khafiyatun

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقۡرَءُواْ كِتَٰبِيَهۡ
verses.transliteration: Faamma man ootiya kitabahu biyameenihi fayaqoolu haomu iqraoo kitabiyah

verses.text: إِنِّي ظَنَنتُ أَنِّي مُلَٰقٍ حِسَابِيَهۡ
verses.transliteration: Innee thanantu annee mulaqin hisabiyah

verses.text: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٖ رَّاضِيَةٖ
verses.transliteration: Fahuwa fee AAeeshatin radiyatin

verses.text: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٖ
verses.transliteration: Fee jannatin AAaliyatin

verses.text: قُطُوفُهَا دَانِيَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Qutoofuha daniyatun

verses.text: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَآ أَسۡلَفۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَيَّامِ ٱلۡخَالِيَةِ
verses.transliteration: Kuloo waishraboo haneean bima aslaftum fee alayyami alkhaliyati

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أُوتَ كِتَٰبِيَهۡ
verses.transliteration: Waamma man ootiya kitabahu bishimalihi fayaqoolu ya laytanee lam oota kitabiyah

verses.text: وَلَمۡ أَدۡرِ مَا حِسَابِيَهۡ
verses.transliteration: Walam adri ma hisabiyah

verses.text: يَٰلَيۡتَهَا كَانَتِ ٱلۡقَاضِيَةَ
verses.transliteration: Ya laytaha kanati alqadiyatu

verses.text: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنِّي مَالِيَهۡۜ
verses.transliteration: Ma aghna AAannee maliyah

verses.text: هَلَكَ عَنِّي سُلۡطَٰنِيَهۡ
verses.transliteration: Halaka AAannee sultaniyah

verses.text: خُذُوهُ فَغُلُّوهُ
verses.transliteration: Khuthoohu faghulloohu

verses.text: ثُمَّ ٱلۡجَحِيمَ صَلُّوهُ
verses.transliteration: Thumma aljaheema salloohu

verses.text: ثُمَّ فِي سِلۡسِلَةٖ ذَرۡعُهَا سَبۡعُونَ ذِرَاعٗا فَٱسۡلُكُوهُ
verses.transliteration: Thumma fee silsilatin tharAAuha sabAAoona thiraAAan faoslukoohu

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Innahu kana la yuminu biAllahi alAAatheemi

verses.text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينِ
verses.transliteration: Wala yahuddu AAala taAAami almiskeeni

verses.text: فَلَيۡسَ لَهُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ هَٰهُنَا حَمِيمٞ
verses.transliteration: Falaysa lahu alyawma hahuna hameemun

verses.text: وَلَا طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنۡ غِسۡلِينٖ
verses.transliteration: Wala taAAamun illa min ghisleenin

verses.text: لَّا يَأۡكُلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡخَٰطِـُٔونَ
verses.transliteration: La yakuluhu illa alkhatioona

verses.text: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِمَا تُبۡصِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fala oqsimu bima tubsiroona

verses.text: وَمَا لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wama la tubsiroona

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلُ رَسُولٖ كَرِيمٖ
verses.transliteration: Innahu laqawlu rasoolin kareemin

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَاعِرٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تُؤۡمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wama huwa biqawli shaAAirin qaleelan ma tuminoona

verses.text: وَلَا بِقَوۡلِ كَاهِنٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wala biqawli kahinin qaleelan ma tathakkaroona

verses.text: تَنزِيلٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Tanzeelun min rabbi alAAalameena

verses.text: وَلَوۡ تَقَوَّلَ عَلَيۡنَا بَعۡضَ ٱلۡأَقَاوِيلِ
verses.transliteration: Walaw taqawwala AAalayna baAAda alaqaweeli

verses.text: لَأَخَذۡنَا مِنۡهُ بِٱلۡيَمِينِ
verses.transliteration: Laakhathna minhu bialyameeni

verses.text: ثُمَّ لَقَطَعۡنَا مِنۡهُ ٱلۡوَتِينَ
verses.transliteration: Thumma laqataAAna minhu alwateena

verses.text: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنۡ أَحَدٍ عَنۡهُ حَٰجِزِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fama minkum min ahadin AAanhu hajizeena

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَتَذۡكِرَةٞ لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wainnahu latathkiratun lilmuttaqeena

verses.text: وَإِنَّا لَنَعۡلَمُ أَنَّ مِنكُم مُّكَذِّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wainna lanaAAlamu anna minkum mukaththibeena

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَسۡرَةٌ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wainnahu lahasratun AAala alkafireena

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَقُّ ٱلۡيَقِينِ
verses.transliteration: Wainnahu lahaqqu alyaqeeni

verses.text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Fasabbih biismi rabbika alAAatheemi

verses.text: سَأَلَ سَآئِلُۢ بِعَذَابٖ وَاقِعٖ
verses.transliteration: Saala sailun biAAathabin waqiAAin

verses.text: لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ لَيۡسَ لَهُۥ دَافِعٞ
verses.transliteration: Lilkafireena laysa lahu dafiAAun

verses.text: مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ذِي ٱلۡمَعَارِجِ
verses.transliteration: Mina Allahi thee almaAAariji

verses.text: تَعۡرُجُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيۡهِ فِي يَوۡمٖ كَانَ مِقۡدَارُهُۥ خَمۡسِينَ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٖ
verses.transliteration: TaAAruju almalaikatu waalrroohu ilayhi fee yawmin kana miqdaruhu khamseena alfa sanatin

verses.text: فَٱصۡبِرۡ صَبۡرٗا جَمِيلًا
verses.transliteration: Faisbir sabran jameelan

verses.text: إِنَّهُمۡ يَرَوۡنَهُۥ بَعِيدٗا
verses.transliteration: Innahum yarawnahu baAAeedan

verses.text: وَنَرَىٰهُ قَرِيبٗا
verses.transliteration: Wanarahu qareeban

verses.text: يَوۡمَ تَكُونُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ كَٱلۡمُهۡلِ
verses.transliteration: Yawma takoonu alssamao kaalmuhli

verses.text: وَتَكُونُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَٱلۡعِهۡنِ
verses.transliteration: Watakoonu aljibalu kaalAAihni

verses.text: وَلَا يَسۡـَٔلُ حَمِيمٌ حَمِيمٗا
verses.transliteration: Wala yasalu hameemun hameeman

verses.text: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمۡۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُ لَوۡ يَفۡتَدِي مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمِئِذِۭ بِبَنِيهِ
verses.transliteration: Yubassaroonahum yawaddu almujrimu law yaftadee min AAathabi yawmiithin bibaneehi

verses.text: وَصَٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَأَخِيهِ
verses.transliteration: Wasahibatihi waakheehi

verses.text: وَفَصِيلَتِهِ ٱلَّتِي تُـٔۡوِيهِ
verses.transliteration: Wafaseelatihi allatee tuweehi

verses.text: وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ
verses.transliteration: Waman fee alardi jameeAAan thumma yunjeehi

verses.text: كَلَّآۖ إِنَّهَا لَظَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Kalla innaha latha

verses.text: نَزَّاعَةٗ لِّلشَّوَىٰ
verses.transliteration: NazzaAAatan lilshshawa

verses.text: تَدۡعُواْ مَنۡ أَدۡبَرَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: TadAAoo man adbara watawalla

verses.text: وَجَمَعَ فَأَوۡعَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: WajamaAAa faawAAa

verses.text: ۞إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا
verses.transliteration: Inna alinsana khuliqa halooAAan

verses.text: إِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ جَزُوعٗا
verses.transliteration: Itha massahu alshsharru jazooAAan

verses.text: وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلۡخَيۡرُ مَنُوعًا
verses.transliteration: Waitha massahu alkhayru manooAAan

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱلۡمُصَلِّينَ
verses.transliteration: Illa almusalleena

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمۡ دَآئِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Allatheena hum AAala salatihim daimoona

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ فِيٓ أَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ حَقّٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ
verses.transliteration: Waallatheena fee amwalihim haqqun maAAloomun

verses.text: لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلۡمَحۡرُومِ
verses.transliteration: Lilssaili waalmahroomi

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُصَدِّقُونَ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.transliteration: Waallatheena yusaddiqoona biyawmi alddeeni

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Waallatheena hum min AAathabi rabbihim mushfiqoona

verses.text: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمۡ غَيۡرُ مَأۡمُونٖ
verses.transliteration: Inna AAathaba rabbihim ghayru mamoonin

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ لِفُرُوجِهِمۡ حَٰفِظُونَ
verses.transliteration: Waallatheena hum lifuroojihim hafithoona

verses.text: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ غَيۡرُ مَلُومِينَ
verses.transliteration: Illa AAala azwajihim aw ma malakat aymanuhum fainnahum ghayru maloomeena

verses.text: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ
verses.transliteration: Famani ibtagha waraa thalika faolaika humu alAAadoona

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ لِأَمَٰنَٰتِهِمۡ وَعَهۡدِهِمۡ رَٰعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Waallatheena hum liamanatihim waAAahdihim raAAoona

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِشَهَٰدَٰتِهِمۡ قَآئِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Waallatheena hum bishahadatihim qaimoona

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمۡ يُحَافِظُونَ
verses.transliteration: Waallatheena hum AAala salatihim yuhafithoona

verses.text: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ مُّكۡرَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Olaika fee jannatin mukramoona

verses.text: فَمَالِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ قِبَلَكَ مُهۡطِعِينَ
verses.transliteration: Famali allatheena kafaroo qibalaka muhtiAAeena

verses.text: عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ عِزِينَ
verses.transliteration: AAani alyameeni waAAani alshshimali AAizeena

verses.text: أَيَطۡمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُدۡخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٖ
verses.transliteration: AyatmaAAu kullu imriin minhum an yudkhala jannata naAAeemin

verses.text: كَلَّآۖ إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰهُم مِّمَّا يَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Kalla inna khalaqnahum mimma yaAAlamoona

verses.text: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡمَشَٰرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغَٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَٰدِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fala oqsimu birabbi almashariqi waalmagharibi inna laqadiroona

verses.text: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ
verses.transliteration: AAala an nubaddila khayran minhum wama nahnu bimasbooqeena

verses.text: فَذَرۡهُمۡ يَخُوضُواْ وَيَلۡعَبُواْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fatharhum yakhoodoo wayalAAaboo hatta yulaqoo yawmahumu allathee yooAAadoona

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ سِرَاعٗا كَأَنَّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٖ يُوفِضُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yawma yakhrujoona mina alajdathi siraAAan kaannahum ila nusubin yoofidoona

verses.text: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يُوعَدُونَ
verses.transliteration: KhashiAAatan absaruhum tarhaquhum thillatun thalika alyawmu allathee kanoo yooAAadoona

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَنۡ أَنذِرۡ قَوۡمَكَ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
verses.transliteration: Inna arsalna noohan ila qawmihi an anthir qawmaka min qabli an yatiyahum AAathabun aleemun

verses.text: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ
verses.transliteration: Qala ya qawmi innee lakum natheerun mubeenun

verses.text: أَنِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.transliteration: Ani oAAbudoo Allaha waittaqoohu waateeAAooni

verses.text: يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُؤَخِّرۡكُمۡ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمًّىۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُۚ لَوۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yaghfir lakum min thunoobikum wayuakhkhirkum ila ajalin musamman inna ajala Allahi itha jaa la yuakhkharu law kuntum taAAlamoona

verses.text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا
verses.transliteration: Qala rabbi innee daAAawtu qawmee laylan wanaharan

verses.text: فَلَمۡ يَزِدۡهُمۡ دُعَآءِيٓ إِلَّا فِرَارٗا
verses.transliteration: Falam yazidhum duAAaee illa firaran

verses.text: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ لِتَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ جَعَلُوٓاْ أَصَٰبِعَهُمۡ فِيٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَٱسۡتَغۡشَوۡاْ ثِيَابَهُمۡ وَأَصَرُّواْ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ ٱسۡتِكۡبَارٗا
verses.transliteration: Wainnee kullama daAAawtuhum litaghfira lahum jaAAaloo asabiAAahum fee athanihim waistaghshaw thiyabahum waasarroo waistakbaroo istikbaran

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ جِهَارٗا
verses.transliteration: Thumma innee daAAawtuhum jiharan

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارٗا
verses.transliteration: Thumma innee aAAlantu lahum waasrartu lahum israran

verses.text: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا
verses.transliteration: Faqultu istaghfiroo rabbakum innahu kana ghaffaran

verses.text: يُرۡسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّدۡرَارٗا
verses.transliteration: Yursili alssamaa AAalaykum midraran

verses.text: وَيُمۡدِدۡكُم بِأَمۡوَٰلٖ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٖ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ أَنۡهَٰرٗا
verses.transliteration: Wayumdidkum biamwalin wabaneena wayajAAal lakum jannatin wayajAAal lakum anharan

verses.text: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارٗا
verses.transliteration: Ma lakum la tarjoona lillahi waqaran

verses.text: وَقَدۡ خَلَقَكُمۡ أَطۡوَارًا
verses.transliteration: Waqad khalaqakum atwaran

verses.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗا
verses.transliteration: Alam taraw kayfa khalaqa Allahu sabAAa samawatin tibaqan

verses.text: وَجَعَلَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ سِرَاجٗا
verses.transliteration: WajaAAala alqamara feehinna nooran wajaAAala alshshamsa sirajan

verses.text: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ نَبَاتٗا
verses.transliteration: WaAllahu anbatakum mina alardi nabatan

verses.text: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمۡ فِيهَا وَيُخۡرِجُكُمۡ إِخۡرَاجٗا
verses.transliteration: Thumma yuAAeedukum feeha wayukhrijukum ikhrajan

verses.text: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِسَاطٗا
verses.transliteration: WaAllahu jaAAala lakumu alarda bisatan

verses.text: لِّتَسۡلُكُواْ مِنۡهَا سُبُلٗا فِجَاجٗا
verses.transliteration: Litaslukoo minha subulan fijajan

verses.text: قَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِي وَٱتَّبَعُواْ مَن لَّمۡ يَزِدۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا
verses.transliteration: Qala noohun rabbi innahum AAasawnee waittabaAAoo man lam yazidhu maluhu wawaladuhu illa khasaran

verses.text: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا كُبَّارٗا
verses.transliteration: Wamakaroo makran kubbaran

verses.text: وَقَالُواْ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدّٗا وَلَا سُوَاعٗا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسۡرٗا
verses.transliteration: Waqaloo la tatharunna alihatakum wala tatharunna waddan wala suwaAAan wala yaghootha wayaAAooqa wanasran

verses.text: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّواْ كَثِيرٗاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلٗا
verses.transliteration: Waqad adalloo katheeran wala tazidi alththalimeena illa dalalan

verses.text: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٰٔتِهِمۡ أُغۡرِقُواْ فَأُدۡخِلُواْ نَارٗا فَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارٗا
verses.transliteration: Mimma khateeatihim oghriqoo faodkhiloo naran falam yajidoo lahum min dooni Allahi ansaran

verses.text: وَقَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
verses.transliteration: Waqala noohun rabbi la tathar AAala alardi mina alkafireena dayyaran

verses.text: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرۡهُمۡ يُضِلُّواْ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓاْ إِلَّا فَاجِرٗا كَفَّارٗا
verses.transliteration: Innaka in tatharhum yudilloo AAibadaka wala yalidoo illa fajiran kaffaran

verses.text: رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيۡتِيَ مُؤۡمِنٗا وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارَۢا
verses.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir lee waliwalidayya waliman dakhala baytiya muminan walilmumineena waalmuminati wala tazidi alththalimeena illa tabaran

verses.text: قُلۡ أُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسۡتَمَعَ نَفَرٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا سَمِعۡنَا قُرۡءَانًا عَجَبٗا
verses.transliteration: Qul oohiya ilayya annahu istamaAAa nafarun mina aljinni faqaloo inna samiAAna quranan AAajaban

verses.text: يَهۡدِيٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشۡدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ وَلَن نُّشۡرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدٗا
verses.transliteration: Yahdee ila alrrushdi faamanna bihi walan nushrika birabbina ahadan

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَٰحِبَةٗ وَلَا وَلَدٗا
verses.transliteration: Waannahu taAAala jaddu rabbina ma ittakhatha sahibatan wala waladan

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطٗا
verses.transliteration: Waannahu kana yaqoolu safeehuna AAala Allahi shatatan

verses.text: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلۡإِنسُ وَٱلۡجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا
verses.transliteration: Waanna thananna an lan taqoola alinsu waaljinnu AAala Allahi kathiban

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمۡ رَهَقٗا
verses.transliteration: Waannahu kana rijalun mina alinsi yaAAoothoona birijalin mina aljinni fazadoohum rahaqan

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُمۡ ظَنُّواْ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن لَّن يَبۡعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٗا
verses.transliteration: Waannahum thannoo kama thanantum an lan yabAAatha Allahu ahadan

verses.text: وَأَنَّا لَمَسۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدۡنَٰهَا مُلِئَتۡ حَرَسٗا شَدِيدٗا وَشُهُبٗا
verses.transliteration: Waanna lamasna alssamaa fawajadnaha muliat harasan shadeedan washuhuban

verses.text: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقۡعُدُ مِنۡهَا مَقَٰعِدَ لِلسَّمۡعِۖ فَمَن يَسۡتَمِعِ ٱلۡأٓنَ يَجِدۡ لَهُۥ شِهَابٗا رَّصَدٗا
verses.transliteration: Waanna kunna naqAAudu minha maqaAAida lilssamAAi faman yastamiAAi alana yajid lahu shihaban rasadan

verses.text: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدۡرِيٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ أَرَادَ بِهِمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ رَشَدٗا
verses.transliteration: Waanna la nadree asharrun oreeda biman fee alardi am arada bihim rabbuhum rashadan

verses.text: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدٗا
verses.transliteration: Waanna minna alssalihoona waminna doona thalika kunna taraiqa qidadan

verses.text: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعۡجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَن نُّعۡجِزَهُۥ هَرَبٗا
verses.transliteration: Wanna thananna an lan nuAAjiza Allaha fee alardi walan nuAAjizahu haraban

verses.text: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعۡنَا ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ فَمَن يُؤۡمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخۡسٗا وَلَا رَهَقٗا
verses.transliteration: Waanna lamma samiAAna alhuda amanna bihi faman yumin birabbihi fala yakhafu bakhsan wala rahaqan

verses.text: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلۡمُسۡلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلۡقَٰسِطُونَۖ فَمَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوۡاْ رَشَدٗا
verses.transliteration: Waanna minna almuslimoona waminna alqasitoona faman aslama faolaika taharraw rashadan

verses.text: وَأَمَّا ٱلۡقَٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُواْ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبٗا
verses.transliteration: Waama alqasitoona fakanoo lijahannama hataban

verses.text: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقٗا
verses.transliteration: Waallawi istaqamoo AAala alttareeqati laasqaynahum maan ghadaqan

verses.text: لِّنَفۡتِنَهُمۡ فِيهِۚ وَمَن يُعۡرِضۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسۡلُكۡهُ عَذَابٗا صَعَدٗا
verses.transliteration: Linaftinahum feehi waman yuAArid AAan thikri rabbihi yaslukhu AAathaban saAAadan

verses.text: وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدۡعُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٗا
verses.transliteration: Waanna almasajida lillahi fala tadAAoo maAAa Allahi ahadan

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدۡعُوهُ كَادُواْ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِ لِبَدٗا
verses.transliteration: Waannahu lamma qama AAabdu Allahi yadAAoohu kadoo yakoonoona AAalayhi libadan

verses.text: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا
verses.transliteration: Qul innama adAAoo rabbee wala oshriku bihi ahadan

verses.text: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَآ أَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا رَشَدٗا
verses.transliteration: Qul innee la amliku lakum darran wala rashadan

verses.text: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَن يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٞ وَلَنۡ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلۡتَحَدًا
verses.transliteration: Qul innee lan yujeeranee mina Allahi ahadun walan ajida min doonihi multahadan

verses.text: إِلَّا بَلَٰغٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَٰلَٰتِهِۦۚ وَمَن يَعۡصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا
verses.transliteration: Illa balaghan mina Allahi warisalatihi waman yaAAsi Allaha warasoolahu fainna lahu nara jahannama khalideena feeha abadan

verses.text: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوۡاْ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَضۡعَفُ نَاصِرٗا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدٗا
verses.transliteration: Hatta itha raaw ma yooAAadoona fasayaAAlamoona man adAAafu nasiran waaqallu AAadadan

verses.text: قُلۡ إِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٞ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمۡ يَجۡعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّيٓ أَمَدًا
verses.transliteration: Qul in adree aqareebun ma tooAAadoona am yajAAalu lahu rabbee amadan

verses.text: عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ فَلَا يُظۡهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيۡبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
verses.transliteration: AAalimu alghaybi fala yuthhiru AAala ghaybihi ahadan

verses.text: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرۡتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٖ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسۡلُكُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦ رَصَدٗا
verses.transliteration: Illa mani irtada min rasoolin fainnahu yasluku min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi rasadan

verses.text: لِّيَعۡلَمَ أَن قَدۡ أَبۡلَغُواْ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ وَأَحۡصَىٰ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عَدَدَۢا
verses.transliteration: LiyaAAlama an qad ablaghoo risalati rabbihim waahata bima ladayhim waahsa kulla shayin AAadadan

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمُزَّمِّلُ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha almuzzammilu

verses.text: قُمِ ٱلَّيۡلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
verses.transliteration: Qumi allayla illa qaleelan

verses.text: نِّصۡفَهُۥٓ أَوِ ٱنقُصۡ مِنۡهُ قَلِيلًا
verses.transliteration: Nisfahu awi onqus minhu qaleelan

verses.text: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا
verses.transliteration: Aw zid AAalayhi warattili alqurana tarteelan

verses.text: إِنَّا سَنُلۡقِي عَلَيۡكَ قَوۡلٗا ثَقِيلًا
verses.transliteration: Inna sanulqee AAalayka qawlan thaqeelan

verses.text: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيۡلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطۡـٔٗا وَأَقۡوَمُ قِيلًا
verses.transliteration: Inna nashiata allayli hiya ashaddu watan waaqwamu qeelan

verses.text: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبۡحٗا طَوِيلٗا
verses.transliteration: Inna laka fee alnnahari sabhan taweelan

verses.text: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا
verses.transliteration: Waothkuri isma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabteelan

verses.text: رَّبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذۡهُ وَكِيلٗا
verses.transliteration: Rabbu almashriqi waalmaghribi la ilaha illa huwa faittakhithhu wakeelan

verses.text: وَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهۡجُرۡهُمۡ هَجۡرٗا جَمِيلٗا
verses.transliteration: Waisbir AAala ma yaqooloona waohjurhum hajran jameelan

verses.text: وَذَرۡنِي وَٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ أُوْلِي ٱلنَّعۡمَةِ وَمَهِّلۡهُمۡ قَلِيلًا
verses.transliteration: Watharnee waalmukaththibeena olee alnnaAAmati wamahhilhum qaleelan

verses.text: إِنَّ لَدَيۡنَآ أَنكَالٗا وَجَحِيمٗا
verses.transliteration: Inna ladayna ankalan wajaheeman

verses.text: وَطَعَامٗا ذَا غُصَّةٖ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا
verses.transliteration: WataAAaman tha ghussatin waAAathaban aleeman

verses.text: يَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَثِيبٗا مَّهِيلًا
verses.transliteration: Yawma tarjufu alardu waaljibalu wakanati aljibalu katheeban maheelan

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ رَسُولٗا شَٰهِدًا عَلَيۡكُمۡ كَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ رَسُولٗا
verses.transliteration: Inna arsalna ilaykum rasoolan shahidan AAalaykum kama arsalna ila firAAawna rasoolan

verses.text: فَعَصَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ أَخۡذٗا وَبِيلٗا
verses.transliteration: FaAAasa firAAawnu alrrasoola faakhathnahu akhthan wabeelan

verses.text: فَكَيۡفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرۡتُمۡ يَوۡمٗا يَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡوِلۡدَٰنَ شِيبًا
verses.transliteration: Fakayfa tattaqoona in kafartum yawman yajAAalu alwildana sheeban

verses.text: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا
verses.transliteration: Alssamao munfatirun bihi kana waAAduhu mafAAoolan

verses.text: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
verses.transliteration: Inna hathihi tathkiratun faman shaa ittakhatha ila rabbihi sabeelan

verses.text: ۞إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعۡلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدۡنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَيِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَنِصۡفَهُۥ وَثُلُثَهُۥ وَطَآئِفَةٞ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مَعَكَۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحۡصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡكُمۡۖ فَٱقۡرَءُواْ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرۡضَىٰ وَءَاخَرُونَ يَضۡرِبُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَبۡتَغُونَ مِن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ وَءَاخَرُونَ يُقَٰتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۖ فَٱقۡرَءُواْ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنۡهُۚ وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَقۡرِضُواْ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗاۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُواْ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنۡ خَيۡرٖ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيۡرٗا وَأَعۡظَمَ أَجۡرٗاۚ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمُۢ
verses.transliteration: Inna rabbaka yaAAlamu annaka taqoomu adna min thuluthayi allayli wanisfahu wathuluthahu wataifatun mina allatheena maAAaka waAllahu yuqaddiru allayla waalnnahara AAalima an lan tuhsoohu fataba AAalaykum faiqraoo ma tayassara mina alqurani AAalima an sayakoonu minkum marda waakharoona yadriboona fee alardi yabtaghoona min fadli Allahi waakharoona yuqatiloona fee sabeeli Allahi faiqraoo ma tayassara minhu waaqeemoo alssalata waatoo alzzakata waaqridoo Allaha qardan hasanan wama tuqaddimoo lianfusikum min khayrin tajidoohu AAinda Allahi huwa khayran waaAAthama ajran waistaghfiroo Allaha inna Allaha ghafoorun raheemun

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمُدَّثِّرُ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha almuddaththiru

verses.text: قُمۡ فَأَنذِرۡ
verses.transliteration: Qum faanthir

verses.text: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرۡ
verses.transliteration: Warabbaka fakabbir

verses.text: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرۡ
verses.transliteration: Wathiyabaka fatahhir

verses.text: وَٱلرُّجۡزَ فَٱهۡجُرۡ
verses.transliteration: Waalrrujza faohjur

verses.text: وَلَا تَمۡنُن تَسۡتَكۡثِرُ
verses.transliteration: Wala tamnun tastakthiru

verses.text: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَٱصۡبِرۡ
verses.transliteration: Walirabbika faisbir

verses.text: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِي ٱلنَّاقُورِ
verses.transliteration: Faitha nuqira fee alnnaqoori

verses.text: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَوۡمٌ عَسِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Fathalika yawmaithin yawmun AAaseerun

verses.text: عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ غَيۡرُ يَسِيرٖ
verses.transliteration: AAala alkafireena ghayru yaseerin

verses.text: ذَرۡنِي وَمَنۡ خَلَقۡتُ وَحِيدٗا
verses.transliteration: Tharnee waman khalaqtu waheedan

verses.text: وَجَعَلۡتُ لَهُۥ مَالٗا مَّمۡدُودٗا
verses.transliteration: WajaAAaltu lahu malan mamdoodan

verses.text: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودٗا
verses.transliteration: Wabaneena shuhoodan

verses.text: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُۥ تَمۡهِيدٗا
verses.transliteration: Wamahhadtu lahu tamheedan

verses.text: ثُمَّ يَطۡمَعُ أَنۡ أَزِيدَ
verses.transliteration: Thumma yatmaAAu an azeeda

verses.text: كَلَّآۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لِأٓيَٰتِنَا عَنِيدٗا
verses.transliteration: Kalla innahu kana liayatina AAaneedan

verses.text: سَأُرۡهِقُهُۥ صَعُودًا
verses.transliteration: Saorhiquhu saAAoodan

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
verses.transliteration: Innahu fakkara waqaddara

verses.text: فَقُتِلَ كَيۡفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.transliteration: Faqutila kayfa qaddara

verses.text: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيۡفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.transliteration: Thumma qutila kayfa qaddara

verses.text: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
verses.transliteration: Thumma nathara

verses.text: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
verses.transliteration: Thumma AAabasa wabasara

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَدۡبَرَ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ
verses.transliteration: Thumma adbara waistakbara

verses.text: فَقَالَ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ يُؤۡثَرُ
verses.transliteration: Faqala in hatha illa sihrun yutharu

verses.text: إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا قَوۡلُ ٱلۡبَشَرِ
verses.transliteration: In hatha illa qawlu albashari

verses.text: سَأُصۡلِيهِ سَقَرَ
verses.transliteration: Saosleehi saqara

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا سَقَرُ
verses.transliteration: Wama adraka ma saqaru

verses.text: لَا تُبۡقِي وَلَا تَذَرُ
verses.transliteration: La tubqee wala tatharu

verses.text: لَوَّاحَةٞ لِّلۡبَشَرِ
verses.transliteration: Lawwahatun lilbashari

verses.text: عَلَيۡهَا تِسۡعَةَ عَشَرَ
verses.transliteration: AAalayha tisAAata AAashara

verses.text: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَآ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَـٰٓئِكَةٗۖ وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا عِدَّتَهُمۡ إِلَّا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِيَسۡتَيۡقِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَيَزۡدَادَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنٗا وَلَا يَرۡتَابَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَلِيَقُولَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ وَٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَٰذَا مَثَلٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَمَا يَعۡلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَمَا هِيَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡبَشَرِ
verses.transliteration: Wama jaAAalna ashaba alnnari illa malaikatan wama jaAAalna AAiddatahum illa fitnatan lillatheena kafaroo liyastayqina allatheena ootoo alkitaba wayazdada allatheena amanoo eemanan wala yartaba allatheena ootoo alkitaba waalmuminoona waliyaqoola allatheena fee quloobihim maradun waalkafiroona matha arada Allahu bihatha mathalan kathalika yudillu Allahu man yashao wayahdee man yashao wama yaAAlamu junooda rabbika illa huwa wama hiya illa thikra lilbashari

verses.text: كَلَّا وَٱلۡقَمَرِ
verses.transliteration: Kalla waalqamari

verses.text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذۡ أَدۡبَرَ
verses.transliteration: Waallayli ith adbara

verses.text: وَٱلصُّبۡحِ إِذَآ أَسۡفَرَ
verses.transliteration: Waalssubhi itha asfara

verses.text: إِنَّهَا لَإِحۡدَى ٱلۡكُبَرِ
verses.transliteration: Innaha laihda alkubari

verses.text: نَذِيرٗا لِّلۡبَشَرِ
verses.transliteration: Natheeran lilbashari

verses.text: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوۡ يَتَأَخَّرَ
verses.transliteration: Liman shaa minkum an yataqaddama aw yataakhkhara

verses.text: كُلُّ نَفۡسِۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ رَهِينَةٌ
verses.transliteration: Kullu nafsin bima kasabat raheenatun

verses.text: إِلَّآ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡيَمِينِ
verses.transliteration: Illa ashaba alyameeni

verses.text: فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fee jannatin yatasaaloona

verses.text: عَنِ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: AAani almujrimeena

verses.text: مَا سَلَكَكُمۡ فِي سَقَرَ
verses.transliteration: Ma salakakum fee saqara

verses.text: قَالُواْ لَمۡ نَكُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُصَلِّينَ
verses.transliteration: Qaloo lam naku mina almusalleena

verses.text: وَلَمۡ نَكُ نُطۡعِمُ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ
verses.transliteration: Walam naku nutAAimu almiskeena

verses.text: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ ٱلۡخَآئِضِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wakunna nakhoodu maAAa alkhaideena

verses.text: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.transliteration: Wakunna nukaththibu biyawmi alddeeni

verses.text: حَتَّىٰٓ أَتَىٰنَا ٱلۡيَقِينُ
verses.transliteration: Hatta atana alyaqeenu

verses.text: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمۡ شَفَٰعَةُ ٱلشَّـٰفِعِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fama tanfaAAuhum shafaAAatu alshshafiAAeena

verses.text: فَمَا لَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلتَّذۡكِرَةِ مُعۡرِضِينَ
verses.transliteration: Fama lahum AAani alttathkirati muAArideena

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُمۡ حُمُرٞ مُّسۡتَنفِرَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Kaannahum humurun mustanfiratun

verses.text: فَرَّتۡ مِن قَسۡوَرَةِۭ
verses.transliteration: Farrat min qaswaratin

verses.text: بَلۡ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُؤۡتَىٰ صُحُفٗا مُّنَشَّرَةٗ
verses.transliteration: Bal yureedu kullu imriin minhum an yuta suhufan munashsharatan

verses.text: كَلَّاۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ
verses.transliteration: Kalla bal la yakhafoona alakhirata

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُۥ تَذۡكِرَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Kalla innahu tathkiratun

verses.text: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Faman shaa thakarahu

verses.text: وَمَا يَذۡكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ أَهۡلُ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ وَأَهۡلُ ٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِ
verses.transliteration: Wama yathkuroona illa an yashaa Allahu huwa ahlu alttaqwa waahlu almaghfirati

verses.text: لَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ
verses.transliteration: La oqsimu biyawmi alqiyamati

verses.text: وَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلنَّفۡسِ ٱللَّوَّامَةِ
verses.transliteration: Wala oqsimu bialnnafsi allawwamati

verses.text: أَيَحۡسَبُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَلَّن نَّجۡمَعَ عِظَامَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Ayahsabu alinsanu allan najmaAAa AAithamahu

verses.text: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Bala qadireena AAala an nusawwiya bananahu

verses.text: بَلۡ يُرِيدُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ لِيَفۡجُرَ أَمَامَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Bal yureedu alinsanu liyafjura amamahu

verses.text: يَسۡـَٔلُ أَيَّانَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ
verses.transliteration: Yasalu ayyana yawmu alqiyamati

verses.text: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ
verses.transliteration: Faitha bariqa albasaru

verses.text: وَخَسَفَ ٱلۡقَمَرُ
verses.transliteration: Wakhasafa alqamaru

verses.text: وَجُمِعَ ٱلشَّمۡسُ وَٱلۡقَمَرُ
verses.transliteration: WajumiAAa alshshamsu waalqamaru

verses.text: يَقُولُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذٍ أَيۡنَ ٱلۡمَفَرُّ
verses.transliteration: Yaqoolu alinsanu yawmaithin ayna almafarru

verses.text: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
verses.transliteration: Kalla la wazara

verses.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقَرُّ
verses.transliteration: Ila rabbika yawmaithin almustaqarru

verses.text: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
verses.transliteration: Yunabbao alinsanu yawmaithin bima qaddama waakhkhara

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦ بَصِيرَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Bali alinsanu AAala nafsihi baseeratun

verses.text: وَلَوۡ أَلۡقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Walaw alqa maAAatheerahu

verses.text: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦٓ
verses.transliteration: La tuharrik bihi lisanaka litaAAjala bihi

verses.text: إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا جَمۡعَهُۥ وَقُرۡءَانَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Inna AAalayna jamAAahu waquranahu

verses.text: فَإِذَا قَرَأۡنَٰهُ فَٱتَّبِعۡ قُرۡءَانَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Faitha qaranahu faittabiAA quranahu

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا بَيَانَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Thumma inna AAalayna bayanahu

verses.text: كَلَّا بَلۡ تُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ
verses.transliteration: Kalla bal tuhibboona alAAajilata

verses.text: وَتَذَرُونَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ
verses.transliteration: Watatharoona alakhirata

verses.text: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ نَّاضِرَةٌ
verses.transliteration: Wujoohun yawmaithin nadiratun

verses.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Ila rabbiha nathiratun

verses.text: وَوُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بَاسِرَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Wawujoohun yawmaithin basiratun

verses.text: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفۡعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Tathunnu an yufAAala biha faqiratun

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلتَّرَاقِيَ
verses.transliteration: Kalla itha balaghati alttaraqiya

verses.text: وَقِيلَ مَنۡۜ رَاقٖ
verses.transliteration: Waqeela man raqin

verses.text: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ ٱلۡفِرَاقُ
verses.transliteration: Wathanna annahu alfiraqu

verses.text: وَٱلۡتَفَّتِ ٱلسَّاقُ بِٱلسَّاقِ
verses.transliteration: Wailtaffati alssaqu bialssaqi

verses.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡمَسَاقُ
verses.transliteration: Ila rabbika yawmaithin almasaqu

verses.text: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Fala saddaqa wala salla

verses.text: وَلَٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Walakin kaththaba watawalla

verses.text: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ يَتَمَطَّىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Thumma thahaba ila ahlihi yatamatta

verses.text: أَوۡلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوۡلَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Awla laka faawla

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَوۡلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوۡلَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Thumma awla laka faawla

verses.text: أَيَحۡسَبُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَن يُتۡرَكَ سُدًى
verses.transliteration: Ayahsabu alinsanu an yutraka sudan

verses.text: أَلَمۡ يَكُ نُطۡفَةٗ مِّن مَّنِيّٖ يُمۡنَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Alam yaku nutfatan min manayyin yumna

verses.text: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةٗ فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Thumma kana AAalaqatan fakhalaqa fasawwa

verses.text: فَجَعَلَ مِنۡهُ ٱلزَّوۡجَيۡنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: FajaAAala minhu alzzawjayni alththakara waalontha

verses.text: أَلَيۡسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Alaysa thalika biqadirin AAala an yuhyiya almawta

verses.text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ حِينٞ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهۡرِ لَمۡ يَكُن شَيۡـٔٗا مَّذۡكُورًا
verses.transliteration: Hal ata AAala alinsani heenun mina alddahri lam yakun shayan mathkooran

verses.text: إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ أَمۡشَاجٖ نَّبۡتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرًا
verses.transliteration: Inna khalaqna alinsana min nutfatin amshajin nabtaleehi fajaAAalnahu sameeAAan baseeran

verses.text: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.transliteration: Inna hadaynahu alssabeela imma shakiran waimma kafooran

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَاْ وَأَغۡلَٰلٗا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.transliteration: Inna aAAtadna lilkafireena salasila waaghlalan wasaAAeeran

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.transliteration: Inna alabrara yashraboona min kasin kana mizajuha kafooran

verses.text: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرٗا
verses.transliteration: AAaynan yashrabu biha AAibadu Allahi yufajjiroonaha tafjeeran

verses.text: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذۡرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوۡمٗا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسۡتَطِيرٗا
verses.transliteration: Yoofoona bialnnathri wayakhafoona yawman kana sharruhu mustateeran

verses.text: وَيُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِينٗا وَيَتِيمٗا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.transliteration: WayutAAimona alttaAAama AAala hubbihi miskeenan wayateeman waaseeran

verses.text: إِنَّمَا نُطۡعِمُكُمۡ لِوَجۡهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.transliteration: Innama nutAAimukum liwajhi Allahi la nureedu minkum jazaan wala shukooran

verses.text: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا
verses.transliteration: Inna nakhafu min rabbina yawman AAaboosan qamtareeran

verses.text: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةٗ وَسُرُورٗا
verses.transliteration: Fawaqahumu Allahu sharra thalika alyawmi walaqqahum nadratan wasurooran

verses.text: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُواْ جَنَّةٗ وَحَرِيرٗا
verses.transliteration: Wajazahum bima sabaroo jannatan wahareeran

verses.text: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِۖ لَا يَرَوۡنَ فِيهَا شَمۡسٗا وَلَا زَمۡهَرِيرٗا
verses.transliteration: Muttakieena feeha AAala alaraiki la yarawna feeha shamsan wala zamhareeran

verses.text: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيۡهِمۡ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِيلٗا
verses.transliteration: Wadaniyatan AAalayhim thilaluha wathullilat qutoofuha tathleelan

verses.text: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيۡهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٖ مِّن فِضَّةٖ وَأَكۡوَابٖ كَانَتۡ قَوَارِيرَا۠
verses.transliteration: Wayutafu AAalayhim bianiyatin min fiddatin waakwabin kanat qawareera

verses.text: قَوَارِيرَاْ مِن فِضَّةٖ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقۡدِيرٗا
verses.transliteration: Qawareera min fiddatin qaddarooha taqdeeran

verses.text: وَيُسۡقَوۡنَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.transliteration: Wayusqawna feeha kasan kana mizajuha zanjabeelan

verses.text: عَيۡنٗا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلۡسَبِيلٗا
verses.transliteration: AAaynan feeha tusamma salsabeelan

verses.text: ۞وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وِلۡدَٰنٞ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ حَسِبۡتَهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٗا مَّنثُورٗا
verses.transliteration: Wayatoofu AAalayhim wildanun mukhalladoona itha raaytahum hasibtahum luluan manthooran

verses.text: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيۡتَ نَعِيمٗا وَمُلۡكٗا كَبِيرًا
verses.transliteration: Waitha raayta thamma raayta naAAeeman wamulkan kabeeran

verses.text: عَٰلِيَهُمۡ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضۡرٞ وَإِسۡتَبۡرَقٞۖ وَحُلُّوٓاْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٖ وَسَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ شَرَابٗا طَهُورًا
verses.transliteration: AAaliyahum thiyabu sundusin khudrun waistabraqun wahulloo asawira min fiddatin wasaqahum rabbuhum sharaban tahooran

verses.text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَكَانَ سَعۡيُكُم مَّشۡكُورًا
verses.transliteration: Inna hatha kana lakum jazaan wakana saAAyukum mashkooran

verses.text: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِيلٗا
verses.transliteration: Inna nahnu nazzalna AAalayka alqurana tanzeelan

verses.text: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مِنۡهُمۡ ءَاثِمًا أَوۡ كَفُورٗا
verses.transliteration: Faisbir lihukmi rabbika wala tutiAA minhum athiman aw kafooran

verses.text: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلٗا
verses.transliteration: Waothkuri isma rabbika bukratan waaseelan

verses.text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَٱسۡجُدۡ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحۡهُ لَيۡلٗا طَوِيلًا
verses.transliteration: Wamina allayli faosjud lahu wasabbihhu laylan taweelan

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمۡ يَوۡمٗا ثَقِيلٗا
verses.transliteration: Inna haolai yuhibboona alAAajilata wayatharoona waraahum yawman thaqeelan

verses.text: نَّحۡنُ خَلَقۡنَٰهُمۡ وَشَدَدۡنَآ أَسۡرَهُمۡۖ وَإِذَا شِئۡنَا بَدَّلۡنَآ أَمۡثَٰلَهُمۡ تَبۡدِيلًا
verses.transliteration: Nahnu khalaqnahum washadadna asrahum waitha shina baddalna amthalahum tabdeelan

verses.text: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلٗا
verses.transliteration: Inna hathihi tathkiratun faman shaa ittakhatha ila rabbihi sabeelan

verses.text: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا
verses.transliteration: Wama tashaoona illa an yashaa Allahu inna Allaha kana AAaleeman hakeeman

verses.text: يُدۡخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمَۢا
verses.transliteration: Yudkhilu man yashao fee rahmatihi waalththalimeena aAAadda lahum AAathaban aleeman

verses.text: وَٱلۡمُرۡسَلَٰتِ عُرۡفٗا
verses.transliteration: Waalmursalati AAurfan

verses.text: فَٱلۡعَٰصِفَٰتِ عَصۡفٗا
verses.transliteration: FaalAAasifati AAasfan

verses.text: وَٱلنَّـٰشِرَٰتِ نَشۡرٗا
verses.transliteration: Waalnnashirati nashran

verses.text: فَٱلۡفَٰرِقَٰتِ فَرۡقٗا
verses.transliteration: Faalfariqati farqan

verses.text: فَٱلۡمُلۡقِيَٰتِ ذِكۡرًا
verses.transliteration: Faalmulqiyati thikran

verses.text: عُذۡرًا أَوۡ نُذۡرًا
verses.transliteration: AAuthran aw nuthran

verses.text: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَٰقِعٞ
verses.transliteration: Innama tooAAadoona lawaqiAAun

verses.text: فَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ طُمِسَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Faitha alnnujoomu tumisat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ فُرِجَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha alssamao furijat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجِبَالُ نُسِفَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha aljibalu nusifat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha alrrusulu oqqitat

verses.text: لِأَيِّ يَوۡمٍ أُجِّلَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Liayyi yawmin ojjilat

verses.text: لِيَوۡمِ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ
verses.transliteration: Liyawmi alfasli

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ
verses.transliteration: Wama adraka ma yawmu alfasli

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Waylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena

verses.text: أَلَمۡ نُهۡلِكِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Alam nuhliki alawwaleena

verses.text: ثُمَّ نُتۡبِعُهُمُ ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Thumma nutbiAAuhumu alakhireena

verses.text: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفۡعَلُ بِٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Kathalika nafAAalu bialmujrimeena

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Waylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena

verses.text: أَلَمۡ نَخۡلُقكُّم مِّن مَّآءٖ مَّهِينٖ
verses.transliteration: Alam nakhluqkum min main maheenin

verses.text: فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ فِي قَرَارٖ مَّكِينٍ
verses.transliteration: FajaAAalnahu fee qararin makeenin

verses.text: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
verses.transliteration: Ila qadarin maAAloomin

verses.text: فَقَدَرۡنَا فَنِعۡمَ ٱلۡقَٰدِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Faqadarna faniAAma alqadiroona

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Waylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena

verses.text: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَلِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ كِفَاتًا
verses.transliteration: Alam najAAali alarda kifatan

verses.text: أَحۡيَآءٗ وَأَمۡوَٰتٗا
verses.transliteration: Ahyaan waamwatan

verses.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ شَٰمِخَٰتٖ وَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُم مَّآءٗ فُرَاتٗا
verses.transliteration: WajaAAalna feeha rawasiya shamikhatin waasqaynakum maan furatan

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Waylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena

verses.text: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Intaliqoo ila ma kuntum bihi tukaththiboona

verses.text: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ ظِلّٖ ذِي ثَلَٰثِ شُعَبٖ
verses.transliteration: Intaliqoo ila thillin thee thalathi shuAAabin

verses.text: لَّا ظَلِيلٖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
verses.transliteration: La thaleelin wala yughnee mina allahabi

verses.text: إِنَّهَا تَرۡمِي بِشَرَرٖ كَٱلۡقَصۡرِ
verses.transliteration: Innaha tarmee bishararin kaalqasri

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُۥ جِمَٰلَتٞ صُفۡرٞ
verses.transliteration: Kaannahu jimalatun sufrun

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Waylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena

verses.text: هَٰذَا يَوۡمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Hatha yawmu la yantiqoona

verses.text: وَلَا يُؤۡذَنُ لَهُمۡ فَيَعۡتَذِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wala yuthanu lahum fayaAAtathiroona

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Waylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena

verses.text: هَٰذَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِۖ جَمَعۡنَٰكُمۡ وَٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Hatha yawmu alfasli jamaAAnakum waalawwaleena

verses.text: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمۡ كَيۡدٞ فَكِيدُونِ
verses.transliteration: Fain kana lakum kaydun fakeedooni

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Waylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَٰلٖ وَعُيُونٖ
verses.transliteration: Inna almuttaqeena fee thilalin waAAuyoonin

verses.text: وَفَوَٰكِهَ مِمَّا يَشۡتَهُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wafawakiha mimma yashtahoona

verses.text: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Kuloo waishraboo haneean bima kuntum taAAmaloona

verses.text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Inna kathalika najzee almuhsineena

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Waylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena

verses.text: كُلُواْ وَتَمَتَّعُواْ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجۡرِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Kuloo watamattaAAoo qaleelan innakum mujrimoona

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Waylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena

verses.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ
verses.transliteration: Waitha qeela lahumu irkaAAoo la yarkaAAoona

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Waylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثِۭ بَعۡدَهُۥ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fabiayyi hadeethin baAAdahu yuminoona

verses.text: عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: AAamma yatasaaloona

verses.text: عَنِ ٱلنَّبَإِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
verses.transliteration: AAani alnnabai alAAatheemi

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي هُمۡ فِيهِ مُخۡتَلِفُونَ
verses.transliteration: Allathee hum feehi mukhtalifoona

verses.text: كَلَّا سَيَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Kalla sayaAAlamoona

verses.text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Thumma kalla sayaAAlamoona

verses.text: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَلِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِهَٰدٗا
verses.transliteration: Alam najAAali alarda mihadan

verses.text: وَٱلۡجِبَالَ أَوۡتَادٗا
verses.transliteration: Waaljibala awtadan

verses.text: وَخَلَقۡنَٰكُمۡ أَزۡوَٰجٗا
verses.transliteration: Wakhalaqnakum azwajan

verses.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا نَوۡمَكُمۡ سُبَاتٗا
verses.transliteration: WajaAAalna nawmakum subatan

verses.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلَّيۡلَ لِبَاسٗا
verses.transliteration: WajaAAalna allayla libasan

verses.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلنَّهَارَ مَعَاشٗا
verses.transliteration: WajaAAalna alnnahara maAAashan

verses.text: وَبَنَيۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمۡ سَبۡعٗا شِدَادٗا
verses.transliteration: Wabanayna fawqakum sabAAan shidadan

verses.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا سِرَاجٗا وَهَّاجٗا
verses.transliteration: WajaAAalna sirajan wahhajan

verses.text: وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُعۡصِرَٰتِ مَآءٗ ثَجَّاجٗا
verses.transliteration: Waanzalna mina almuAAsirati maan thajjajan

verses.text: لِّنُخۡرِجَ بِهِۦ حَبّٗا وَنَبَاتٗا
verses.transliteration: Linukhrija bihi habban wanabatan

verses.text: وَجَنَّـٰتٍ أَلۡفَافًا
verses.transliteration: Wajannatin alfafan

verses.text: إِنَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ كَانَ مِيقَٰتٗا
verses.transliteration: Inna yawma alfasli kana meeqatan

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجٗا
verses.transliteration: Yawma yunfakhu fee alssoori fatatoona afwajan

verses.text: وَفُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتۡ أَبۡوَٰبٗا
verses.transliteration: Wafutihati alssamao fakanat abwaban

verses.text: وَسُيِّرَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ فَكَانَتۡ سَرَابًا
verses.transliteration: Wasuyyirati aljibalu fakanat saraban

verses.text: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتۡ مِرۡصَادٗا
verses.transliteration: Inna jahannama kanat mirsadan

verses.text: لِّلطَّـٰغِينَ مَـَٔابٗا
verses.transliteration: Lilttagheena maaban

verses.text: لَّـٰبِثِينَ فِيهَآ أَحۡقَابٗا
verses.transliteration: Labitheena feeha ahqaban

verses.text: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرۡدٗا وَلَا شَرَابًا
verses.transliteration: La yathooqoona feeha bardan wala sharaban

verses.text: إِلَّا حَمِيمٗا وَغَسَّاقٗا
verses.transliteration: Illa hameeman waghassaqan

verses.text: جَزَآءٗ وِفَاقًا
verses.transliteration: Jazaan wifaqan

verses.text: إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَرۡجُونَ حِسَابٗا
verses.transliteration: Innahum kanoo la yarjoona hisaban

verses.text: وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كِذَّابٗا
verses.transliteration: Wakaththaboo biayatina kiththaban

verses.text: وَكُلَّ شَيۡءٍ أَحۡصَيۡنَٰهُ كِتَٰبٗا
verses.transliteration: Wakulla shayin ahsaynahu kitaban

verses.text: فَذُوقُواْ فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمۡ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
verses.transliteration: Fathooqoo falan nazeedakum illa AAathaban

verses.text: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
verses.transliteration: Inna lilmuttaqeena mafazan

verses.text: حَدَآئِقَ وَأَعۡنَٰبٗا
verses.transliteration: Hadaiqa waaAAnaban

verses.text: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتۡرَابٗا
verses.transliteration: WakawaAAiba atraban

verses.text: وَكَأۡسٗا دِهَاقٗا
verses.transliteration: Wakasan dihaqan

verses.text: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا كِذَّـٰبٗا
verses.transliteration: La yasmaAAoona feeha laghwan wala kiththaban

verses.text: جَزَآءٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَآءً حِسَابٗا
verses.transliteration: Jazaan min rabbika AAataan hisaban

verses.text: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۖ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابٗا
verses.transliteration: Rabbi alssamawati waalardi wama baynahuma alrrahmani la yamlikoona minhu khitaban

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفّٗاۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابٗا
verses.transliteration: Yawma yaqoomu alrroohu waalmalaikatu saffan la yatakallamoona illa man athina lahu alrrahmanu waqala sawaban

verses.text: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
verses.transliteration: Thalika alyawmu alhaqqu faman shaa ittakhatha ila rabbihi maaban

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَنذَرۡنَٰكُمۡ عَذَابٗا قَرِيبٗا يَوۡمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡكَافِرُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَٰبَۢا
verses.transliteration: Inna antharnakum AAathaban qareeban yawma yanthuru almaro ma qaddamat yadahu wayaqoolu alkafiru ya laytanee kuntu turaban

verses.text: وَٱلنَّـٰزِعَٰتِ غَرۡقٗا
verses.transliteration: WaalnnaziAAati gharqan

verses.text: وَٱلنَّـٰشِطَٰتِ نَشۡطٗا
verses.transliteration: Waalnnashitati nashtan

verses.text: وَٱلسَّـٰبِحَٰتِ سَبۡحٗا
verses.transliteration: Waalssabihati sabhan

verses.text: فَٱلسَّـٰبِقَٰتِ سَبۡقٗا
verses.transliteration: Faalssabiqati sabqan

verses.text: فَٱلۡمُدَبِّرَٰتِ أَمۡرٗا
verses.transliteration: Faalmudabbirati amran

verses.text: يَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلرَّاجِفَةُ
verses.transliteration: Yawma tarjufu alrrajifatu

verses.text: تَتۡبَعُهَا ٱلرَّادِفَةُ
verses.transliteration: TatbaAAuha alrradifatu

verses.text: قُلُوبٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَاجِفَةٌ
verses.transliteration: Quloobun yawmaithin wajifatun

verses.text: أَبۡصَٰرُهَا خَٰشِعَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Absaruha khashiAAatun

verses.text: يَقُولُونَ أَءِنَّا لَمَرۡدُودُونَ فِي ٱلۡحَافِرَةِ
verses.transliteration: Yaqooloona ainna lamardoodoona fee alhafirati

verses.text: أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَٰمٗا نَّخِرَةٗ
verses.transliteration: Aitha kunna AAithaman nakhiratan

verses.text: قَالُواْ تِلۡكَ إِذٗا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Qaloo tilka ithan karratun khasiratun

verses.text: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجۡرَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Fainnama hiya zajratun wahidatun

verses.text: فَإِذَا هُم بِٱلسَّاهِرَةِ
verses.transliteration: Faitha hum bialssahirati

verses.text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Hal ataka hadeethu moosa

verses.text: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.transliteration: Ith nadahu rabbuhu bialwadi almuqaddasi tuwan

verses.text: ٱذۡهَبۡ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Ithhab ila firAAawna innahu tagha

verses.text: فَقُلۡ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Faqul hal laka ila an tazakka

verses.text: وَأَهۡدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخۡشَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Waahdiyaka ila rabbika fatakhsha

verses.text: فَأَرَىٰهُ ٱلۡأٓيَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Faarahu alayata alkubra

verses.text: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Fakaththaba waAAasa

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَدۡبَرَ يَسۡعَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Thumma adbara yasAAa

verses.text: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Fahashara fanada

verses.text: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Faqala ana rabbukumu alaAAla

verses.text: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّهُ نَكَالَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Faakhathahu Allahu nakala alakhirati waaloola

verses.text: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّمَن يَخۡشَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Inna fee thalika laAAibratan liman yakhsha

verses.text: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُۚ بَنَىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Aantum ashaddu khalqan ami alssamao banaha

verses.text: رَفَعَ سَمۡكَهَا فَسَوَّىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: RafaAAa samkaha fasawwaha

verses.text: وَأَغۡطَشَ لَيۡلَهَا وَأَخۡرَجَ ضُحَىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Waaghtasha laylaha waakhraja duhaha

verses.text: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَىٰهَآ
verses.transliteration: Waalarda baAAda thalika dahaha

verses.text: أَخۡرَجَ مِنۡهَا مَآءَهَا وَمَرۡعَىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Akhraja minha maaha wamarAAaha

verses.text: وَٱلۡجِبَالَ أَرۡسَىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Waaljibala arsaha

verses.text: مَتَٰعٗا لَّكُمۡ وَلِأَنۡعَٰمِكُمۡ
verses.transliteration: MataAAan lakum walianAAamikum

verses.text: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلطَّآمَّةُ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Faitha jaati alttammatu alkubra

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Yawma yatathakkaru alinsanu ma saAAa

verses.text: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلۡجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Waburrizati aljaheemu liman yara

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Faamma man tagha

verses.text: وَءَاثَرَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا
verses.transliteration: Waathara alhayata alddunya

verses.text: فَإِنَّ ٱلۡجَحِيمَ هِيَ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Fainna aljaheema hiya almawa

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفۡسَ عَنِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Waama man khafa maqama rabbihi wanaha alnnafsa AAani alhawa

verses.text: فَإِنَّ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ هِيَ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Fainna aljannata hiya almawa

verses.text: يَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرۡسَىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Yasaloonaka AAani alssaAAati ayyana mursaha

verses.text: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكۡرَىٰهَآ
verses.transliteration: Feema anta min thikraha

verses.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَآ
verses.transliteration: Ila rabbika muntahaha

verses.text: إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخۡشَىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Innama anta munthiru man yakhshaha

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَهَا لَمۡ يَلۡبَثُوٓاْ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوۡ ضُحَىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Kaannahum yawma yarawnaha lam yalbathoo illa AAashiyyatan aw duhaha

verses.text: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: AAabasa watawalla

verses.text: أَن جَآءَهُ ٱلۡأَعۡمَىٰ
verses.transliteration: An jaahu alaAAma

verses.text: وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ يَزَّكَّىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Wama yudreeka laAAallahu yazzakka

verses.text: أَوۡ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Aw yaththakkaru fatanfaAAahu alththikra

verses.text: أَمَّا مَنِ ٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Amma mani istaghna

verses.text: فَأَنتَ لَهُۥ تَصَدَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Faanta lahu tasadda

verses.text: وَمَا عَلَيۡكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wama AAalayka alla yazzakka

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَن جَآءَكَ يَسۡعَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Waamma man jaaka yasAAa

verses.text: وَهُوَ يَخۡشَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wahuwa yakhsha

verses.text: فَأَنتَ عَنۡهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Faanta AAanhu talahha

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهَا تَذۡكِرَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Kalla innaha tathkiratun

verses.text: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Faman shaa thakarahu

verses.text: فِي صُحُفٖ مُّكَرَّمَةٖ
verses.transliteration: Fee suhufin mukarramatin

verses.text: مَّرۡفُوعَةٖ مُّطَهَّرَةِۭ
verses.transliteration: MarfooAAatin mutahharatin

verses.text: بِأَيۡدِي سَفَرَةٖ
verses.transliteration: Biaydee safaratin

verses.text: كِرَامِۭ بَرَرَةٖ
verses.transliteration: Kiramin bararatin

verses.text: قُتِلَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَآ أَكۡفَرَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Qutila alinsanu ma akfarahu

verses.text: مِنۡ أَيِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Min ayyi shayin khalaqahu

verses.text: مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Min nutfatin khalaqahu faqaddarahu

verses.text: ثُمَّ ٱلسَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Thumma alssabeela yassarahu

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقۡبَرَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Thumma amatahu faaqbarahu

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَآءَ أَنشَرَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Thumma itha shaa ansharahu

verses.text: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقۡضِ مَآ أَمَرَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Kalla lamma yaqdi ma amarahu

verses.text: فَلۡيَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ
verses.transliteration: Falyanthuri alinsanu ila taAAamihi

verses.text: أَنَّا صَبَبۡنَا ٱلۡمَآءَ صَبّٗا
verses.transliteration: Anna sababna almaa sabban

verses.text: ثُمَّ شَقَقۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ شَقّٗا
verses.transliteration: Thumma shaqaqna alarda shaqqan

verses.text: فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا حَبّٗا
verses.transliteration: Faanbatna feeha habban

verses.text: وَعِنَبٗا وَقَضۡبٗا
verses.transliteration: WaAAinaban waqadban

verses.text: وَزَيۡتُونٗا وَنَخۡلٗا
verses.transliteration: Wazaytoonan wanakhlan

verses.text: وَحَدَآئِقَ غُلۡبٗا
verses.transliteration: Wahadaiqa ghulban

verses.text: وَفَٰكِهَةٗ وَأَبّٗا
verses.transliteration: Wafakihatan waabban

verses.text: مَّتَٰعٗا لَّكُمۡ وَلِأَنۡعَٰمِكُمۡ
verses.transliteration: MataAAan lakum walianAAamikum

verses.text: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلصَّآخَّةُ
verses.transliteration: Faitha jaati alssakhkhatu

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يَفِرُّ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مِنۡ أَخِيهِ
verses.transliteration: Yawma yafirru almaro min akheehi

verses.text: وَأُمِّهِۦ وَأَبِيهِ
verses.transliteration: Waommihi waabeehi

verses.text: وَصَٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَبَنِيهِ
verses.transliteration: Wasahibatihi wabaneehi

verses.text: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ
verses.transliteration: Likulli imriin minhum yawmaithin shanun yughneehi

verses.text: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ مُّسۡفِرَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Wujoohun yawmaithin musfiratun

verses.text: ضَاحِكَةٞ مُّسۡتَبۡشِرَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Dahikatun mustabshiratun

verses.text: وَوُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٍ عَلَيۡهَا غَبَرَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Wawujoohun yawmaithin AAalayha ghabaratun

verses.text: تَرۡهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
verses.transliteration: Tarhaquha qataratun

verses.text: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡكَفَرَةُ ٱلۡفَجَرَةُ
verses.transliteration: Olaika humu alkafaratu alfajaratu

verses.text: إِذَا ٱلشَّمۡسُ كُوِّرَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Itha alshshamsu kuwwirat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ ٱنكَدَرَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha alnnujoomu inkadarat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha aljibalu suyyirat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha alAAisharu AAuttilat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha alwuhooshu hushirat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha albiharu sujjirat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha alnnufoosu zuwwijat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡمَوۡءُۥدَةُ سُئِلَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha almawoodatu suilat

verses.text: بِأَيِّ ذَنۢبٖ قُتِلَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Biayyi thanbin qutilat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha alssuhufu nushirat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ كُشِطَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha alssamao kushitat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha aljaheemu suAAAAirat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجَنَّةُ أُزۡلِفَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha aljannatu ozlifat

verses.text: عَلِمَتۡ نَفۡسٞ مَّآ أَحۡضَرَتۡ
verses.transliteration: AAalimat nafsun ma ahdarat

verses.text: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلۡخُنَّسِ
verses.transliteration: Fala oqsimu bialkhunnasi

verses.text: ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡكُنَّسِ
verses.transliteration: Aljawari alkunnasi

verses.text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا عَسۡعَسَ
verses.transliteration: Waallayli itha AAasAAasa

verses.text: وَٱلصُّبۡحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
verses.transliteration: Waalssubhi itha tanaffasa

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلُ رَسُولٖ كَرِيمٖ
verses.transliteration: Innahu laqawlu rasoolin kareemin

verses.text: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينٖ
verses.transliteration: Thee quwwatin AAinda thee alAAarshi makeenin

verses.text: مُّطَاعٖ ثَمَّ أَمِينٖ
verses.transliteration: MutaAAin thamma ameenin

verses.text: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجۡنُونٖ
verses.transliteration: Wama sahibukum bimajnoonin

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ رَءَاهُ بِٱلۡأُفُقِ ٱلۡمُبِينِ
verses.transliteration: Walaqad raahu bialofuqi almubeeni

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى ٱلۡغَيۡبِ بِضَنِينٖ
