verses.transliteration: Wama huwa AAala alghaybi bidaneenin

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَيۡطَٰنٖ رَّجِيمٖ
verses.transliteration: Wama huwa biqawli shaytanin rajeemin

verses.text: فَأَيۡنَ تَذۡهَبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Faayna tathhaboona

verses.text: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: In huwa illa thikrun lilAAalameena

verses.text: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَسۡتَقِيمَ
verses.transliteration: Liman shaa minkum an yastaqeema

verses.text: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wama tashaoona illa an yashaa Allahu rabbu alAAalameena

verses.text: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنفَطَرَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Itha alssamao infatarat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha alkawakibu intatharat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha albiharu fujjirat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡقُبُورُ بُعۡثِرَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha alqubooru buAAthirat

verses.text: عَلِمَتۡ نَفۡسٞ مَّا قَدَّمَتۡ وَأَخَّرَتۡ
verses.transliteration: AAalimat nafsun ma qaddamat waakhkharat

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alinsanu ma gharraka birabbika alkareemi

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّىٰكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
verses.transliteration: Allathee khalaqaka fasawwaka faAAadalaka

verses.text: فِيٓ أَيِّ صُورَةٖ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
verses.transliteration: Fee ayyi sooratin ma shaa rakkabaka

verses.text: كَلَّا بَلۡ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِٱلدِّينِ
verses.transliteration: Kalla bal tukaththiboona bialddeeni

verses.text: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكُمۡ لَحَٰفِظِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wainna AAalaykum lahafitheena

verses.text: كِرَامٗا كَٰتِبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Kiraman katibeena

verses.text: يَعۡلَمُونَ مَا تَفۡعَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: YaAAlamoona ma tafAAaloona

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٖ
verses.transliteration: Inna alabrara lafee naAAeemin

verses.text: وَإِنَّ ٱلۡفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٖ
verses.transliteration: Wainna alfujjara lafee jaheemin

verses.text: يَصۡلَوۡنَهَا يَوۡمَ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.transliteration: Yaslawnaha yawma alddeeni

verses.text: وَمَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا بِغَآئِبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wama hum AAanha bighaibeena

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.transliteration: Wama adraka ma yawmu alddeeni

verses.text: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.transliteration: Thumma ma adraka ma yawmu alddeeni

verses.text: يَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسٞ لِّنَفۡسٖ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلَّهِ
verses.transliteration: Yawma la tamliku nafsun linafsin shayan waalamru yawmaithin lillahi

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ لِّلۡمُطَفِّفِينَ
verses.transliteration: Waylun lilmutaffifeena

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ
verses.transliteration: Allatheena itha iktaloo AAala alnnasi yastawfoona

verses.text: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمۡ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمۡ يُخۡسِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Waitha kaloohum aw wazanoohum yukhsiroona

verses.text: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبۡعُوثُونَ
verses.transliteration: Ala yathunnu olaika annahum mabAAoothoona

verses.text: لِيَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
verses.transliteration: Liyawmin AAatheemin

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Yawma yaqoomu alnnasu lirabbi alAAalameena

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ
verses.transliteration: Kalla inna kitaba alfujjari lafee sijjeenin

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينٞ
verses.transliteration: Wama adraka ma sijjeenun

verses.text: كِتَٰبٞ مَّرۡقُومٞ
verses.transliteration: Kitabun marqoomun

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.transliteration: Waylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.transliteration: Allatheena yukaththiboona biyawmi alddeeni

verses.text: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.transliteration: Wama yukaththibu bihi illa kullu muAAtadin atheemin

verses.text: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Itha tutla AAalayhi ayatuna qala asateeru alawwaleena

verses.text: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Kalla bal rana AAala quloobihim ma kanoo yaksiboona

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Kalla innahum AAan rabbihim yawmaithin lamahjooboona

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمۡ لَصَالُواْ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Thumma innahum lasaloo aljaheemi

verses.text: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Thumma yuqalu hatha allathee kuntum bihi tukaththiboona

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.transliteration: Kalla inna kitaba alabrari lafee AAilliyyeena

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
verses.transliteration: Wama adraka ma AAilliyyoona

verses.text: كِتَٰبٞ مَّرۡقُومٞ
verses.transliteration: Kitabun marqoomun

verses.text: يَشۡهَدُهُ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yashhaduhu almuqarraboona

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.transliteration: Inna alabrara lafee naAAeemin

verses.text: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: AAala alaraiki yanthuroona

verses.text: تَعۡرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمۡ نَضۡرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
verses.transliteration: TaAArifu fee wujoohihim nadrata alnnaAAeemi

verses.text: يُسۡقَوۡنَ مِن رَّحِيقٖ مَّخۡتُومٍ
verses.transliteration: Yusqawna min raheeqin makhtoomin

verses.text: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكٞۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ
verses.transliteration: Khitamuhu miskun wafee thalika falyatanafasi almutanafisoona

verses.text: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسۡنِيمٍ
verses.transliteration: Wamizajuhu min tasneemin

verses.text: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.transliteration: AAaynan yashrabu biha almuqarraboona

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ
verses.transliteration: Inna allatheena ajramoo kanoo mina allatheena amanoo yadhakoona

verses.text: وَإِذَا مَرُّواْ بِهِمۡ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
verses.transliteration: Waitha marroo bihim yataghamazoona

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُواْ فَكِهِينَ
verses.transliteration: Waitha inqalaboo ila ahlihimu inqalaboo fakiheena

verses.text: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
verses.transliteration: Waitha raawhum qaloo inna haolai ladalloona

verses.text: وَمَآ أُرۡسِلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wama orsiloo AAalayhim hafitheena

verses.text: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ
verses.transliteration: Faalyawma allatheena amanoo mina alkuffari yadhakoona

verses.text: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: AAala alaraiki yanthuroona

verses.text: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Hal thuwwiba alkuffaru ma kanoo yafAAaloona

verses.text: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتۡ
verses.transliteration: Itha alssamao inshaqqat

verses.text: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waathinat lirabbiha wahuqqat

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مُدَّتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waitha alardu muddat

verses.text: وَأَلۡقَتۡ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waalqat ma feeha watakhallat

verses.text: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waathinat lirabbiha wahuqqat

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alinsanu innaka kadihun ila rabbika kadhan famulaqeehi

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ
verses.transliteration: Faama man ootiya kitabahu biyameenihi

verses.text: فَسَوۡفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابٗا يَسِيرٗا
verses.transliteration: Fasawfa yuhasabu hisaban yaseeran

verses.text: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورٗا
verses.transliteration: Wayanqalibu ila ahlihi masrooran

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ
verses.transliteration: Waamma man ootiya kitabahu waraa thahrihi

verses.text: فَسَوۡفَ يَدۡعُواْ ثُبُورٗا
verses.transliteration: Fasawfa yadAAoo thubooran

verses.text: وَيَصۡلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
verses.transliteration: Wayasla saAAeeran

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِيٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورًا
verses.transliteration: Innahu kana fee ahlihi masrooran

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
verses.transliteration: Innahu thanna an lan yahoora

verses.text: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا
verses.transliteration: Bala inna rabbahu kana bihi baseeran

verses.text: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ
verses.transliteration: Fala oqsimu bialshshafaqi

verses.text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
verses.transliteration: Waallayli wama wasaqa

verses.text: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ
verses.transliteration: Waalqamari itha ittasaqa

verses.text: لَتَرۡكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٖ
verses.transliteration: Latarkabunna tabaqan AAan tabaqin

verses.text: فَمَا لَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fama lahum la yuminoona

verses.text: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩
verses.transliteration: Waitha quria AAalayhimu alquranu la yasjudoona

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Bali allatheena kafaroo yukaththiboona

verses.text: وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
verses.transliteration: WaAllahu aAAlamu bima yooAAoona

verses.text: فَبَشِّرۡهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.transliteration: Fabashshirhum biAAathabin aleemin

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ
verses.transliteration: Illa allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati lahum ajrun ghayru mamnoonin

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡبُرُوجِ
verses.transliteration: Waalssamai thati alburooji

verses.text: وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡمَوۡعُودِ
verses.transliteration: Waalyawmi almawAAoodi

verses.text: وَشَاهِدٖ وَمَشۡهُودٖ
verses.transliteration: Washahidin wamashhoodin

verses.text: قُتِلَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأُخۡدُودِ
verses.transliteration: Qutila ashabu alukhdoodi

verses.text: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡوَقُودِ
verses.transliteration: Alnnari thati alwaqoodi

verses.text: إِذۡ هُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا قُعُودٞ
verses.transliteration: Ith hum AAalayha quAAoodun

verses.text: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ
verses.transliteration: Wahum AAala ma yafAAaloona bialmumineena shuhoodun

verses.text: وَمَا نَقَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ
verses.transliteration: Wama naqamoo minhum illa an yuminoo biAllahi alAAazeezi alhameedi

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ
verses.transliteration: Allathee lahu mulku alssamawati waalardi waAllahu AAala kulli shayin shaheedun

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُواْ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَتُوبُواْ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ
verses.transliteration: Inna allatheena fatanoo almumineena waalmuminati thumma lam yatooboo falahum AAathabu jahannama walahum AAathabu alhareeqi

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ
verses.transliteration: Inna allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati lahum jannatun tajree min tahtiha alanharu thalika alfawzu alkabeeru

verses.text: إِنَّ بَطۡشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.transliteration: Inna batsha rabbika lashadeedun

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبۡدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
verses.transliteration: Innahu huwa yubdio wayuAAeedu

verses.text: وَهُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلۡوَدُودُ
verses.transliteration: Wahuwa alghafooru alwadoodu

verses.text: ذُو ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡمَجِيدُ
verses.transliteration: Thoo alAAarshi almajeedi

verses.text: فَعَّالٞ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
verses.transliteration: FaAAAAalun lima yureedu

verses.text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلۡجُنُودِ
verses.transliteration: Hal ataka hadeethu aljunoodi

verses.text: فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَثَمُودَ
verses.transliteration: FirAAawna wathamooda

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي تَكۡذِيبٖ
verses.transliteration: Bali allatheena kafaroo fee taktheebin

verses.text: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطُۢ
verses.transliteration: WaAllahu min waraihim muheetun

verses.text: بَلۡ هُوَ قُرۡءَانٞ مَّجِيدٞ
verses.transliteration: Bal huwa quranun majeedun

verses.text: فِي لَوۡحٖ مَّحۡفُوظِۭ
verses.transliteration: Fee lawhin mahfoothin

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ
verses.transliteration: Waalssamai waalttariqi

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ
verses.transliteration: Wama adraka ma alttariqu

verses.text: ٱلنَّجۡمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ
verses.transliteration: Alnnajmu alththaqibu

verses.text: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ
verses.transliteration: In kullu nafsin lamma AAalayha hafithun

verses.text: فَلۡيَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
verses.transliteration: Falyanthuri alinsanu mimma khuliqa

verses.text: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٖ دَافِقٖ
verses.transliteration: Khuliqa min main dafiqin

verses.text: يَخۡرُجُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ ٱلصُّلۡبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ
verses.transliteration: Yakhruju min bayni alssulbi waalttaraibi

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجۡعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٞ
verses.transliteration: Innahu AAala rajAAihi laqadirun

verses.text: يَوۡمَ تُبۡلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ
verses.transliteration: Yawma tubla alssarairu

verses.text: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٖ وَلَا نَاصِرٖ
verses.transliteration: Fama lahu min quwwatin wala nasirin

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجۡعِ
verses.transliteration: Waalssamai thati alrrajAAi

verses.text: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدۡعِ
verses.transliteration: Waalardi thati alssadAAi

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلٞ فَصۡلٞ
verses.transliteration: Innahu laqawlun faslun

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلۡهَزۡلِ
verses.transliteration: Wama huwa bialhazli

verses.text: إِنَّهُمۡ يَكِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗا
verses.transliteration: Innahum yakeedoona kaydan

verses.text: وَأَكِيدُ كَيۡدٗا
verses.transliteration: Waakeedu kaydan

verses.text: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَمۡهِلۡهُمۡ رُوَيۡدَۢا
verses.transliteration: Famahhili alkafireena amhilhum ruwaydan

verses.text: سَبِّحِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡأَعۡلَى
verses.transliteration: Sabbihi isma rabbika alaAAla

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Allathee khalaqa fasawwa

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Waallathee qaddara fahada

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ ٱلۡمَرۡعَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Waallathee akhraja almarAAa

verses.text: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحۡوَىٰ
verses.transliteration: FajaAAalahu ghuthaan ahwa

verses.text: سَنُقۡرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Sanuqrioka fala tansa

verses.text: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Illa ma shaa Allahu innahu yaAAlamu aljahra wama yakhfa

verses.text: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلۡيُسۡرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wanuyassiruka lilyusra

verses.text: فَذَكِّرۡ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Fathakkir in nafaAAati alththikra

verses.text: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخۡشَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Sayaththakkaru man yakhsha

verses.text: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى
verses.transliteration: Wayatajannabuha alashqa

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي يَصۡلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Allathee yasla alnnara alkubra

verses.text: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Thumma la yamootu feeha wala yahya

verses.text: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Qad aflaha man tazakka

verses.text: وَذَكَرَ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wathakara isma rabbihi fasalla

verses.text: بَلۡ تُؤۡثِرُونَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا
verses.transliteration: Bal tuthiroona alhayata alddunya

verses.text: وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Waalakhiratu khayrun waabqa

verses.text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِي ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Inna hatha lafee alssuhufi aloola

verses.text: صُحُفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Suhufi ibraheema wamoosa

verses.text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلۡغَٰشِيَةِ
verses.transliteration: Hal ataka hadeethu alghashiyati

verses.text: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَٰشِعَةٌ
verses.transliteration: Wujoohun yawmaithin khashiAAatun

verses.text: عَامِلَةٞ نَّاصِبَةٞ
verses.transliteration: AAamilatun nasibatun

verses.text: تَصۡلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةٗ
verses.transliteration: Tasla naran hamiyatan

verses.text: تُسۡقَىٰ مِنۡ عَيۡنٍ ءَانِيَةٖ
verses.transliteration: Tusqa min AAaynin aniyatin

verses.text: لَّيۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٖ
verses.transliteration: Laysa lahum taAAamun illa min dareeAAin

verses.text: لَّا يُسۡمِنُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِن جُوعٖ
verses.transliteration: La yusminu wala yughnee min jooAAin

verses.text: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ نَّاعِمَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Wujoohun yawmaithin naAAimatun

verses.text: لِّسَعۡيِهَا رَاضِيَةٞ
verses.transliteration: LisaAAyiha radiyatun

verses.text: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٖ
verses.transliteration: Fee jannatin AAaliyatin

verses.text: لَّا تَسۡمَعُ فِيهَا لَٰغِيَةٗ
verses.transliteration: La tasmaAAu feeha laghiyatan

verses.text: فِيهَا عَيۡنٞ جَارِيَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Feeha AAaynun jariyatun

verses.text: فِيهَا سُرُرٞ مَّرۡفُوعَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Feeha sururun marfooAAatun

verses.text: وَأَكۡوَابٞ مَّوۡضُوعَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Waakwabun mawdooAAatun

verses.text: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصۡفُوفَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Wanamariqu masfoofatun

verses.text: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبۡثُوثَةٌ
verses.transliteration: Wazarabiyyu mabthoothatun

verses.text: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Afala yanthuroona ila alibili kayfa khuliqat

verses.text: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيۡفَ رُفِعَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waila alssamai kayfa rufiAAat

verses.text: وَإِلَى ٱلۡجِبَالِ كَيۡفَ نُصِبَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waila aljibali kayfa nusibat

verses.text: وَإِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَيۡفَ سُطِحَتۡ
verses.transliteration: Waila alardi kayfa sutihat

verses.text: فَذَكِّرۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٞ
verses.transliteration: Fathakkir innama anta muthakkirun

verses.text: لَّسۡتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِمُصَيۡطِرٍ
verses.transliteration: Lasta AAalayhim bimusaytirin

verses.text: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
verses.transliteration: Illa man tawalla wakafara

verses.text: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرَ
verses.transliteration: FayuAAaththibuhu Allahu alAAathaba alakbara

verses.text: إِنَّ إِلَيۡنَآ إِيَابَهُمۡ
verses.transliteration: Inna ilayna iyabahum

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا حِسَابَهُم
verses.transliteration: Thumma inna AAalayna hisabahum

verses.text: وَٱلۡفَجۡرِ
verses.transliteration: Waalfajri

verses.text: وَلَيَالٍ عَشۡرٖ
verses.transliteration: Walayalin AAashrin

verses.text: وَٱلشَّفۡعِ وَٱلۡوَتۡرِ
verses.transliteration: WaalshshafAAi waalwatri

verses.text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَسۡرِ
verses.transliteration: Waallayli itha yasri

verses.text: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٞ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ
verses.transliteration: Hal fee thalika qasamun lithee hijrin

verses.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
verses.transliteration: Alam tara kayfa faAAala rabbuka biAAadin

verses.text: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلۡعِمَادِ
verses.transliteration: Irama thati alAAimadi

verses.text: ٱلَّتِي لَمۡ يُخۡلَقۡ مِثۡلُهَا فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ
verses.transliteration: Allatee lam yukhlaq mithluha fee albiladi

verses.text: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُواْ ٱلصَّخۡرَ بِٱلۡوَادِ
verses.transliteration: Wathamooda allatheena jaboo alssakhra bialwadi

verses.text: وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ ذِي ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ
verses.transliteration: WafirAAawna thee alawtadi

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ
verses.transliteration: Allatheena taghaw fee albiladi

verses.text: فَأَكۡثَرُواْ فِيهَا ٱلۡفَسَادَ
verses.transliteration: Faaktharoo feeha alfasada

verses.text: فَصَبَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّكَ سَوۡطَ عَذَابٍ
verses.transliteration: Fasabba AAalayhim rabbuka sawta AAathabin

verses.text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلۡمِرۡصَادِ
verses.transliteration: Inna rabbaka labialmirsadi

verses.text: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكۡرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَكۡرَمَنِ
verses.transliteration: Faamma alinsanu itha ma ibtalahu rabbuhu faakramahu wanaAAAAamahu fayaqoolu rabbee akramani

verses.text: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيۡهِ رِزۡقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَهَٰنَنِ
verses.transliteration: Waamma itha ma ibtalahu faqadara AAalayhi rizqahu fayaqoolu rabbee ahanani

verses.text: كَلَّاۖ بَل لَّا تُكۡرِمُونَ ٱلۡيَتِيمَ
verses.transliteration: Kalla bal la tukrimoona alyateema

verses.text: وَلَا تَحَـٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينِ
verses.transliteration: Wala tahaddoona AAala taAAami almiskeeni

verses.text: وَتَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكۡلٗا لَّمّٗا
verses.transliteration: Watakuloona altturatha aklan lamman

verses.text: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡمَالَ حُبّٗا جَمّٗا
verses.transliteration: Watuhibboona almala hubban jamman

verses.text: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا
verses.transliteration: Kalla itha dukkati alardu dakkan dakkan

verses.text: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلۡمَلَكُ صَفّٗا صَفّٗا
verses.transliteration: Wajaa rabbuka waalmalaku saffan saffan

verses.text: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wajeea yawmaithin bijahannama yawmaithin yatathakkaru alinsanu waanna lahu alththikra

verses.text: يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي قَدَّمۡتُ لِحَيَاتِي
verses.transliteration: Yaqoolu ya laytanee qaddamtu lihayatee

verses.text: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٞ
verses.transliteration: Fayawmaithin la yuAAaththibu AAathabahu ahadun

verses.text: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٞ
verses.transliteration: Wala yoothiqu wathaqahu ahadun

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفۡسُ ٱلۡمُطۡمَئِنَّةُ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyatuha alnnafsu almutmainnatu

verses.text: ٱرۡجِعِيٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةٗ مَّرۡضِيَّةٗ
verses.transliteration: IrjiAAee ila rabbiki radiyatan mardiyyatan

verses.text: فَٱدۡخُلِي فِي عِبَٰدِي
verses.transliteration: Faodkhulee fee AAibadee

verses.text: وَٱدۡخُلِي جَنَّتِي
verses.transliteration: Waodkhulee jannatee

verses.text: لَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ
verses.transliteration: La oqsimu bihatha albaladi

verses.text: وَأَنتَ حِلُّۢ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ
verses.transliteration: Waanta hillun bihatha albaladi

verses.text: وَوَالِدٖ وَمَا وَلَدَ
verses.transliteration: Wawalidin wama walada

verses.text: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِي كَبَدٍ
verses.transliteration: Laqad khalaqna alinsana fee kabadin

verses.text: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ أَحَدٞ
verses.transliteration: Ayahsabu an lan yaqdira AAalayhi ahadun

verses.text: يَقُولُ أَهۡلَكۡتُ مَالٗا لُّبَدًا
verses.transliteration: Yaqoolu ahlaktu malan lubadan

verses.text: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّمۡ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
verses.transliteration: Ayahsabu an lam yarahu ahadun

verses.text: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عَيۡنَيۡنِ
verses.transliteration: Alam najAAal lahu AAaynayni

verses.text: وَلِسَانٗا وَشَفَتَيۡنِ
verses.transliteration: Walisanan washafatayni

verses.text: وَهَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلنَّجۡدَيۡنِ
verses.transliteration: Wahadaynahu alnnajdayni

verses.text: فَلَا ٱقۡتَحَمَ ٱلۡعَقَبَةَ
verses.transliteration: Fala iqtahama alAAaqabata

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡعَقَبَةُ
verses.transliteration: Wama adraka ma alAAaqabatu

verses.text: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
verses.transliteration: Fakku raqabatin

verses.text: أَوۡ إِطۡعَٰمٞ فِي يَوۡمٖ ذِي مَسۡغَبَةٖ
verses.transliteration: Aw itAAamun fee yawmin thee masghabatin

verses.text: يَتِيمٗا ذَا مَقۡرَبَةٍ
verses.transliteration: Yateeman tha maqrabatin

verses.text: أَوۡ مِسۡكِينٗا ذَا مَتۡرَبَةٖ
verses.transliteration: Aw miskeenan tha matrabatin

verses.text: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡمَرۡحَمَةِ
verses.transliteration: Thumma kana mina allatheena amanoo watawasaw bialssabri watawasaw bialmarhamati

verses.text: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَيۡمَنَةِ
verses.transliteration: Olaika ashabu almaymanati

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ
verses.transliteration: Waallatheena kafaroo biayatina hum ashabu almashamati

verses.text: عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَارٞ مُّؤۡصَدَةُۢ
verses.transliteration: AAalayhim narun musadatun

verses.text: وَٱلشَّمۡسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Waalshshamsi waduhaha

verses.text: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Waalqamari itha talaha

verses.text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Waalnnahari itha jallaha

verses.text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَغۡشَىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Waallayli itha yaghshaha

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Waalssamai wama banaha

verses.text: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Waalardi wama tahaha

verses.text: وَنَفۡسٖ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Wanafsin wama sawwaha

verses.text: فَأَلۡهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقۡوَىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Faalhamaha fujooraha wataqwaha

verses.text: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Qad aflaha man zakkaha

verses.text: وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Waqad khaba man dassaha

verses.text: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ بِطَغۡوَىٰهَآ
verses.transliteration: Kaththabat thamoodu bitaghwaha

verses.text: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشۡقَىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Ithi inbaAAatha ashqaha

verses.text: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Faqala lahum rasoolu Allahi naqata Allahi wasuqyaha

verses.text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Fakaththaboohu faAAaqarooha fadamdama AAalayhim rabbuhum bithanbihim fasawwaha

verses.text: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقۡبَٰهَا
verses.transliteration: Wala yakhafu AAuqbaha

verses.text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَغۡشَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Waallayli itha yaghsha

verses.text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Waalnnahari itha tajalla

verses.text: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Wama khalaqa alththakara waalontha

verses.text: إِنَّ سَعۡيَكُمۡ لَشَتَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Inna saAAyakum lashatta

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أَعۡطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Faamma man aAAta waittaqa

verses.text: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wasaddaqa bialhusna

verses.text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡيُسۡرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Fasanuyassiruhu lilyusra

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Waamma man bakhila waistaghna

verses.text: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wakaththaba bialhusna

verses.text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡعُسۡرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Fasanuyassiruhu lilAAusra

verses.text: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Wama yughnee AAanhu maluhu itha taradda

verses.text: إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا لَلۡهُدَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Inna AAalayna lalhuda

verses.text: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلۡأٓخِرَةَ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wainna lana lalakhirata waaloola

verses.text: فَأَنذَرۡتُكُمۡ نَارٗا تَلَظَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Faanthartukum naran talaththa

verses.text: لَا يَصۡلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى
verses.transliteration: La yaslaha illa alashqa

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Allathee kaththaba watawalla

verses.text: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَتۡقَى
verses.transliteration: Wasayujannabuha alatqa

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي يُؤۡتِي مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
verses.transliteration: Allathee yutee malahu yatazakka

verses.text: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةٖ تُجۡزَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Wama liahadin AAindahu min niAAmatin tujza

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱبۡتِغَآءَ وَجۡهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Illa ibtighaa wajhi rabbihi alaAAla

verses.text: وَلَسَوۡفَ يَرۡضَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Walasawfa yarda

verses.text: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Waaldduha

verses.text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Waallayli itha saja

verses.text: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Ma waddaAAaka rabbuka wama qala

verses.text: وَلَلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Walalakhiratu khayrun laka mina aloola

verses.text: وَلَسَوۡفَ يُعۡطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرۡضَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Walasawfa yuAAteeka rabbuka fatarda

verses.text: أَلَمۡ يَجِدۡكَ يَتِيمٗا فَـَٔاوَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Alam yajidka yateeman faawa

verses.text: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلّٗا فَهَدَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wawajadaka dallan fahada

verses.text: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلٗا فَأَغۡنَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Wawajadaka AAailan faaghna

verses.text: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقۡهَرۡ
verses.transliteration: Faamma alyateema fala taqhar

verses.text: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنۡهَرۡ
verses.transliteration: Waamma alssaila fala tanhar

verses.text: وَأَمَّا بِنِعۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثۡ
verses.transliteration: Waamma biniAAmati rabbika fahaddith

verses.text: أَلَمۡ نَشۡرَحۡ لَكَ صَدۡرَكَ
verses.transliteration: Alam nashrah laka sadraka

verses.text: وَوَضَعۡنَا عَنكَ وِزۡرَكَ
verses.transliteration: WawadaAAna AAanka wizraka

verses.text: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهۡرَكَ
verses.transliteration: Allathee anqada thahraka

verses.text: وَرَفَعۡنَا لَكَ ذِكۡرَكَ
verses.transliteration: WarafaAAna laka thikraka

verses.text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرًا
verses.transliteration: Fainna maAAa alAAusri yusran

verses.text: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرٗا
verses.transliteration: Inna maAAa alAAusri yusran

verses.text: فَإِذَا فَرَغۡتَ فَٱنصَبۡ
verses.transliteration: Faitha faraghta fainsab

verses.text: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرۡغَب
verses.transliteration: Waila rabbika fairghab

verses.text: وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيۡتُونِ
verses.transliteration: Waaltteeni waalzzaytooni

verses.text: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
verses.transliteration: Watoori seeneena

verses.text: وَهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ ٱلۡأَمِينِ
verses.transliteration: Wahatha albaladi alameeni

verses.text: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ
verses.transliteration: Laqad khalaqna alinsana fee ahsani taqweemin

verses.text: ثُمَّ رَدَدۡنَٰهُ أَسۡفَلَ سَٰفِلِينَ
verses.transliteration: Thumma radadnahu asfala safileena

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ
verses.transliteration: Illa allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati falahum ajrun ghayru mamnoonin

verses.text: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعۡدُ بِٱلدِّينِ
verses.transliteration: Fama yukaththibuka baAAdu bialddeeni

verses.text: أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحۡكَمِ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Alaysa Allahu biahkami alhakimeena

verses.text: ٱقۡرَأۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ
verses.transliteration: Iqra biismi rabbika allathee khalaqa

verses.text: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِنۡ عَلَقٍ
verses.transliteration: Khalaqa alinsana min AAalaqin

verses.text: ٱقۡرَأۡ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلۡأَكۡرَمُ
verses.transliteration: Iqra warabbuka alakramu

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِٱلۡقَلَمِ
verses.transliteration: Allathee AAallama bialqalami

verses.text: عَلَّمَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مَا لَمۡ يَعۡلَمۡ
verses.transliteration: AAallama alinsana ma lam yaAAlam

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَيَطۡغَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Kalla inna alinsana layatgha

verses.text: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: An raahu istaghna

verses.text: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجۡعَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Inna ila rabbika alrrujAAa

verses.text: أَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي يَنۡهَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Araayta allathee yanha

verses.text: عَبۡدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: AAabdan itha salla

verses.text: أَرَءَيۡتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Araayta in kana AAala alhuda

verses.text: أَوۡ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقۡوَىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Aw amara bialttaqwa

verses.text: أَرَءَيۡتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
verses.transliteration: Araayta in kaththaba watawalla

verses.text: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
verses.transliteration: Alam yaAAlam bianna Allaha yara

verses.text: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
verses.transliteration: Kalla lain lam yantahi lanasfaAAan bialnnasiyati

verses.text: نَاصِيَةٖ كَٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٖ
verses.transliteration: Nasiyatin kathibatin khatiatin

verses.text: فَلۡيَدۡعُ نَادِيَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: FalyadAAu nadiyahu

verses.text: سَنَدۡعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ
verses.transliteration: SanadAAu alzzabaniyata

verses.text: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعۡهُ وَٱسۡجُدۡۤ وَٱقۡتَرِب۩
verses.transliteration: Kalla la tutiAAhu waosjud waiqtarib

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةِ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
verses.transliteration: Inna anzalnahu fee laylati alqadri

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
verses.transliteration: Wama adraka ma laylatu alqadri

verses.text: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
verses.transliteration: Laylatu alqadri khayrun min alfi shahrin

verses.text: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ
verses.transliteration: Tanazzalu almalaikatu waalrroohu feeha biithni rabbihim min kulli amrin

verses.text: سَلَٰمٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطۡلَعِ ٱلۡفَجۡرِ
verses.transliteration: Salamun hiya hatta matlaAAi alfajri

verses.text: لَمۡ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ
verses.transliteration: Lam yakuni allatheena kafaroo min ahli alkitabi waalmushrikeena munfakkeena hatta tatiyahumu albayyinatu

verses.text: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ
verses.transliteration: Rasoolun mina Allahi yatloo suhufan mutahharatan

verses.text: فِيهَا كُتُبٞ قَيِّمَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Feeha kutubun qayyimatun

verses.text: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ
verses.transliteration: Wama tafarraqa allatheena ootoo alkitaba illa min baAAdi ma jaathumu albayyinatu

verses.text: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓاْ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلۡقَيِّمَةِ
verses.transliteration: Wama omiroo illa liyaAAbudoo Allaha mukhliseena lahu alddeena hunafaa wayuqeemoo alssalata wayutoo alzzakata wathalika deenu alqayyimati

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ شَرُّ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ
verses.transliteration: Inna allatheena kafaroo min ahli alkitabi waalmushrikeena fee nari jahannama khalideena feeha olaika hum sharru albariyyati

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ
verses.transliteration: Inna allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati olaika hum khayru albariyyati

verses.text: جَزَآؤُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّـٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ رَّضِيَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُواْ عَنۡهُۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Jazaohum AAinda rabbihim jannatu AAadnin tajree min tahtiha alanharu khalideena feeha abadan radiya Allahu AAanhum waradoo AAanhu thalika liman khashiya rabbahu

verses.text: إِذَا زُلۡزِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ زِلۡزَالَهَا
verses.transliteration: Itha zulzilati alardu zilzalaha

verses.text: وَأَخۡرَجَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ أَثۡقَالَهَا
verses.transliteration: Waakhrajati alardu athqalaha

verses.text: وَقَالَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا لَهَا
verses.transliteration: Waqala alinsanu ma laha

verses.text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُحَدِّثُ أَخۡبَارَهَا
verses.transliteration: Yawmaithin tuhaddithu akhbaraha

verses.text: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوۡحَىٰ لَهَا
verses.transliteration: Bianna rabbaka awha laha

verses.text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
verses.transliteration: Yawmaithin yasduru alnnasu ashtatan liyuraw aAAmalahum

verses.text: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Faman yaAAmal mithqala tharratin khayran yarahu

verses.text: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Waman yaAAmal mithqala tharratin sharran yarahu

verses.text: وَٱلۡعَٰدِيَٰتِ ضَبۡحٗا
verses.transliteration: WaalAAadiyati dabhan

verses.text: فَٱلۡمُورِيَٰتِ قَدۡحٗا
verses.transliteration: Faalmooriyati qadhan

verses.text: فَٱلۡمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبۡحٗا
verses.transliteration: Faalmugheerati subhan

verses.text: فَأَثَرۡنَ بِهِۦ نَقۡعٗا
verses.transliteration: Faatharna bihi naqAAan

verses.text: فَوَسَطۡنَ بِهِۦ جَمۡعًا
verses.transliteration: Fawasatna bihi jamAAan

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٞ
verses.transliteration: Inna alinsana lirabbihi lakanoodun

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٞ
verses.transliteration: Wainnahu AAala thalika lashaheedun

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.transliteration: Wainnahu lihubbi alkhayri lashadeedun

verses.text: ۞أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ
verses.transliteration: Afala yaAAlamu itha buAAthira ma fee alquboori

verses.text: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.transliteration: Wahussila ma fee alssudoori

verses.text: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّخَبِيرُۢ
verses.transliteration: Inna rabbahum bihim yawmaithin lakhabeerun

verses.text: ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ
verses.transliteration: AlqariAAatu

verses.text: مَا ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ
verses.transliteration: Ma alqariAAatu

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ
verses.transliteration: Wama adraka ma alqariAAatu

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلۡفَرَاشِ ٱلۡمَبۡثُوثِ
verses.transliteration: Yawma yakoonu alnnasu kaalfarashi almabthoothi

verses.text: وَتَكُونُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَٱلۡعِهۡنِ ٱلۡمَنفُوشِ
verses.transliteration: Watakoonu aljibalu kaalAAihni almanfooshi

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Faamma man thaqulat mawazeenuhu

verses.text: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٖ رَّاضِيَةٖ
verses.transliteration: Fahuwa fee AAeeshatin radiyatin

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَفَّتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Waamma man khaffat mawazeenuhu

verses.text: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٞ
verses.transliteration: Faommuhu hawiyatun

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا هِيَهۡ
verses.transliteration: Wama adraka ma hiyah

verses.text: نَارٌ حَامِيَةُۢ
verses.transliteration: Narun hamiyatun

verses.text: أَلۡهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ
verses.transliteration: Alhakumu alttakathuru

verses.text: حَتَّىٰ زُرۡتُمُ ٱلۡمَقَابِرَ
verses.transliteration: Hatta zurtumu almaqabira

verses.text: كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Kalla sawfa taAAlamoona

verses.text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Thumma kalla sawfa taAAlamoona

verses.text: كَلَّا لَوۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ عِلۡمَ ٱلۡيَقِينِ
verses.transliteration: Kalla law taAAlamoona AAilma alyaqeeni

verses.text: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلۡجَحِيمَ
verses.transliteration: Latarawunna aljaheema

verses.text: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيۡنَ ٱلۡيَقِينِ
verses.transliteration: Thumma latarawunnaha AAayna alyaqeeni

verses.text: ثُمَّ لَتُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
verses.transliteration: Thumma latusalunna yawmaithin AAani alnnaAAeemi

verses.text: وَٱلۡعَصۡرِ
verses.transliteration: WaalAAasri

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَفِي خُسۡرٍ
verses.transliteration: Inna alinsana lafee khusrin

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ
verses.transliteration: Illa allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati watawasaw bialhaqqi watawasaw bialssabri

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٖ لُّمَزَةٍ
verses.transliteration: Waylun likulli humazatin lumazatin

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالٗا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Allathee jamaAAa malan waAAaddadahu

verses.text: يَحۡسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخۡلَدَهُۥ
verses.transliteration: Yahsabu anna malahu akhladahu

verses.text: كَلَّاۖ لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِي ٱلۡحُطَمَةِ
verses.transliteration: Kalla layunbathanna fee alhutamati

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡحُطَمَةُ
verses.transliteration: Wama adraka ma alhutamatu

verses.text: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمُوقَدَةُ
verses.transliteration: Naru Allahi almooqadatu

verses.text: ٱلَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةِ
verses.transliteration: Allatee tattaliAAu AAala alafidati

verses.text: إِنَّهَا عَلَيۡهِم مُّؤۡصَدَةٞ
verses.transliteration: lnnaha AAalayhim musadatun

verses.text: فِي عَمَدٖ مُّمَدَّدَةِۭ
verses.transliteration: Fee AAamadin mumaddadatin

verses.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡفِيلِ
verses.transliteration: Alam tara kayfa faAAala rabbuka biashabi alfeeli

verses.text: أَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡ كَيۡدَهُمۡ فِي تَضۡلِيلٖ
verses.transliteration: Alam yajAAal kaydahum fee tadleelin

verses.text: وَأَرۡسَلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ طَيۡرًا أَبَابِيلَ
verses.transliteration: Waarsala AAalayhim tayran ababeela

verses.text: تَرۡمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٖ مِّن سِجِّيلٖ
verses.transliteration: Tarmeehim bihijaratin min sijjeelin

verses.text: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ كَعَصۡفٖ مَّأۡكُولِۭ
verses.transliteration: FajaAAalahum kaAAasfin makoolin

verses.text: لِإِيلَٰفِ قُرَيۡشٍ
verses.transliteration: Lieelafi qurayshin

verses.text: إِۦلَٰفِهِمۡ رِحۡلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيۡفِ
verses.transliteration: Eelafihim rihlata alshshitai waalssayfi

verses.text: فَلۡيَعۡبُدُواْ رَبَّ هَٰذَا ٱلۡبَيۡتِ
verses.transliteration: FalyaAAbudoo rabba hatha albayti

verses.text: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ
verses.transliteration: Allathee atAAamahum min jooAAin waamanahum min khawfin

verses.text: أَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ
verses.transliteration: Araayta allathee yukaththibu bialddeeni

verses.text: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِي يَدُعُّ ٱلۡيَتِيمَ
verses.transliteration: Fathalika allathee yaduAAAAu alyateema

verses.text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينِ
verses.transliteration: Wala yahuddu AAala taAAami almiskeeni

verses.text: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلۡمُصَلِّينَ
verses.transliteration: Fawaylun lilmusalleena

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَن صَلَاتِهِمۡ سَاهُونَ
verses.transliteration: Allatheena hum AAan salatihim sahoona

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ يُرَآءُونَ
verses.transliteration: Allatheena hum yuraoona

verses.text: وَيَمۡنَعُونَ ٱلۡمَاعُونَ
verses.transliteration: WayamnaAAoona almaAAoona

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَعۡطَيۡنَٰكَ ٱلۡكَوۡثَرَ
verses.transliteration: Inna aAAtaynaka alkawthara

verses.text: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنۡحَرۡ
verses.transliteration: Fasalli lirabbika wainhar

verses.text: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلۡأَبۡتَرُ
verses.transliteration: Inna shaniaka huwa alabtaru

verses.text: قُلۡ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Qul ya ayyuha alkafiroona

verses.text: لَآ أَعۡبُدُ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ
verses.transliteration: La aAAbudu ma taAAbudoona

verses.text: وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعۡبُدُ
verses.transliteration: Wala antum AAabidoona ma aAAbudu

verses.text: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدٞ مَّا عَبَدتُّمۡ
verses.transliteration: Wala ana AAabidun ma AAabadtum

verses.text: وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعۡبُدُ
verses.transliteration: Wala antum AAabidoona ma aAAbudu

verses.text: لَكُمۡ دِينُكُمۡ وَلِيَ دِينِ
verses.transliteration: Lakum deenukum waliya deeni

verses.text: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصۡرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡفَتۡحُ
verses.transliteration: Itha jaa nasru Allahi waalfathu

verses.text: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا
verses.transliteration: Waraayta alnnasa yadkhuloona fee deeni Allahi afwajan

verses.text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا
verses.transliteration: Fasabbih bihamdi rabbika waistaghfirhu innahu kana tawwaban

verses.text: تَبَّتۡ يَدَآ أَبِي لَهَبٖ وَتَبَّ
verses.transliteration: Tabbat yada abee lahabin watabba

verses.text: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.transliteration: Ma aghna AAanhu maluhu wama kasaba

verses.text: سَيَصۡلَىٰ نَارٗا ذَاتَ لَهَبٖ
verses.transliteration: Sayasla naran thata lahabin

verses.text: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلۡحَطَبِ
verses.transliteration: Waimraatuhu hammalata alhatabi

verses.text: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبۡلٞ مِّن مَّسَدِۭ
verses.transliteration: Fee jeediha hablun min masadin

verses.text: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.transliteration: Qul huwa Allahu ahadun

verses.text: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ
verses.transliteration: Allahu alssamadu

verses.text: لَمۡ يَلِدۡ وَلَمۡ يُولَدۡ
verses.transliteration: Lam yalid walam yooladu

verses.text: وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدُۢ
verses.transliteration: Walam yakun lahu kufuwan ahadun

verses.text: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡفَلَقِ
verses.transliteration: Qul aAAoothu birabbi alfalaqi

verses.text: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
verses.transliteration: Min sharri ma khalaqa

verses.text: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
verses.transliteration: Wamin sharri ghasiqin itha waqaba

verses.text: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّـٰثَٰتِ فِي ٱلۡعُقَدِ
verses.transliteration: Wamin sharri alnnaffathati fee alAAuqadi

verses.text: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
verses.transliteration: Wamin sharri hasidin itha hasada

verses.text: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ
verses.transliteration: Qul aAAoothu birabbi alnnasi

verses.text: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ
verses.transliteration: Maliki alnnasi

verses.text: إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ
verses.transliteration: Ilahi alnnasi

verses.text: مِن شَرِّ ٱلۡوَسۡوَاسِ ٱلۡخَنَّاسِ
verses.transliteration: Min sharri alwaswasi alkhannasi

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي يُوَسۡوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ
verses.transliteration: Allathee yuwaswisu fee sudoori alnnasi

verses.text: مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ
verses.transliteration: Mina aljinnati wa alnnasm
